151b6('dul ba): ro des smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' bzhes shig /nye dgas smras pa/ shes pa can khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin pas khyod de dag gi tshig thos nas yang phyir 'phrog du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i
151b7('dul ba): gnas yod do/ /btsun pa nye dga' ci kho bo'i la ba 'di tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag dbang ba yin nam/ la ba 'di ni kho bo nyid dbang ba yin gyis bzhes shig dang / slar 'phrog tu mi mchis so/ /nye dgas la ba de blangs
151b8('dul ba): nas klam rtsub po gzhan zhig de la byin nas shes pa can de klam rtsub po de gyon nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi gan du phyir song ba dang / de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/ shes pa can khyod kyis yang mgo bsgyur
152a1('dul ba): de nyal ba gang zhig las thob/ des smras pa/ 'di ni glo gzhan nas grub pa yin no/ /ji ltar gyur/ kho bos la ba de btsun pa nye dga' la byin nas des kyang kho bo la la ba 'di byin no/ /de dag gis spyos te smras pa/ shes pa can
152a2('dul ba): shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni yu bu cag gson pas kyang mi dga' ba yin no/ /drug sde dag ji lta bar gzhan de lta ma yin la/ nye dga' ji lta bar drug sde gzhan de lta ma yin no/ /gal te khyod kyis dge slong gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig
152a3('dul ba): la byin par gyur na kho bo cag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed na khyod kyis nye dga' la byin te/ de ni bdag cag las zong gis kyang khrag gi phyis bu len par 'dod pa yin gyis/ gal te la ba khyer te 'ong na de lta na legs/ gal te khyer te mi 'ong na kho
152a4('dul ba): bo cag gis khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas dbyung bar bya zhing / tshul shing yang dbyung bar bya/ spang leb khri'u yang bsgyur bar bya/ slong phor yang khas dbub par bya/ khar ba yang dor bar bya'o/ /de skrag nas nye
152a5('dul ba): dga' ga la ba der song ba dang nye dgas thag ring po kho na nas de 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/ shes pa can 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'di ni bdag gi la ba 'phrog par byed pa yin no snyam nas de gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs nas sgo
152a6('dul ba): bcad de 'dug go/ /shes pa can des sgo brdung bar brtsams te btsun pa nye dga' btsun pa nye dga' zhes bos pa dang / nye dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ shes pa can khyod la btsun pa nye dgas ci bya/ des smras pa/
152a7('dul ba): des kho bo'i la ba zhig khyer ro/ /shes pa can gal te khyod la ba 'dod na song la bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su sgrubs shig /de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shes pa can de thag ring
152a8('dul ba): po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed shes pa can thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba la ltos shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal/ 'di ni la ba'i
152b1('dul ba): phyir 'ongs te/ gal te la ba thob na de lta na legs gal te ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas shes pa can de phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das btsun pa nye dgas bdag
152b2('dul ba): gis 'tshal ba de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la slar stsal du gsol cig / gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la la ba slar stsal du ma stsal na/ 'di ltar bdag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas phyung bar 'gyur zhing
152b3('dul ba): tshul shing yang phyung bar gyur/ spang leb khri'u yang bsgyur bar 'gyur/ slong phor yang khas phub par 'gyur/ khar ba yang bor bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song
152b4('dul ba): la nye dga'i gan du song ste/ shes pa can gyi la ba phyir byin cig /gal te mi byin na shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do zhes gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin
152b5('dul ba): 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang / nye dgas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/ shes pa can gyi pho nya 'di lta bu khrid de 'ongs pas 'dis kho bo
152b6('dul ba): 'i la ba phrogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nye dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa can gyi la ba phyir byin cig /gal te 'di'i la ba phyir myur bar ma byin na shes pa can
152b7('dul ba): 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur pa'i gnas de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes byung ngo / /nye dgas smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ston pa'i bka' mnyan par zad kyi/ gzhan du na sgre byi gcer bu 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba bas
152b8('dul ba): gal te shes pa can sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur la de dag thams cad khrag tsha ba skyugs te kha dag cing dus byed par gyur kyang nye dga'i
153a1('dul ba): spu'i rtse mo tsam yang mi g.yo ste/ 'on kyang bzhud cig dang sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang nye dgas smras pa/ kwa'i gcer bu pa nyon cig khyod kyis ston pa brdzun ma des brdzun du smra bas 'jig rten bslus nas sems can
153a2('dul ba): dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ de'i lce la thong gshol lnga brgyas rmed par byed na/ khyed kyang de bas kyang brdzun ma chen po yin pas khyed kyi lce la yang thong gshol stong gis rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang kho bo'i la ba khyod kyis spyod na/ ci kho bos
153a3('dul ba): kyang khyod kyi la ba spyad snyam 'am/ btsun pa nye dga' ma lags so/ /nye dga'as de'i la ba des 'doms kyi phyogs thams cad phyis nas bzhi ltab tu bltab ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pa g.yas pas thal lcag gis
153a4('dul ba): bsnun pa dang rim pa thams cad rdol bar gyur nas smras pa/ shes pa can lag pa gnyis rkyong shig /des lag pa gnyis brkyang ba dang nye dgas gang gis de khas bub tu 'gyel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shugs kyis la ba lag tu byin pa dang / de khas bub du
153a5('dul ba): 'gyel nas nye dgas rdog pas bsnun te smras pa/ gcer bu pa sgre byi gtsug lag khang sla tsas ma gtal bar song shig /btsun pa nye dga' gal te ma gum na mchi ste/ slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o/ /de ni re shig byung ba yin gyi/
153a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
153a7('dul ba): ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed / bun 'gyed par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i
153a8('dul ba): phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed ce na/ kun tu rtsom par byed/ yul tshol bar byed/ shing rta sog par byed/ yul du 'gro ba'i
153b1('dul ba): rdzas shom par byed/ le'u pa dang gro ba dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed do/ /ji ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed ce na brgyad shas dang / bcu shas dang / bcu gnyis shas kyi phyir dpang po dang /
153b2('dul ba): gro ba dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed do/ /ji ltar phun 'gyel bar byed ce na/ nas dang 'bru rnying pa gser phye dang nye sde'i phyir gtong ba dang / gzhal ba'i snod dang / bre'u chung dang / phul dang gro ba
153b3('dul ba): dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar bun 'gyed par byed do/ /ji ltar skyed 'gyed par byed ce na/ dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar
153b4('dul ba): byed pa dang / mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir bai dUr+ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing / dpang po dang / gro ba dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar skyed 'gyed par byed do/ /ji ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/
153b5('dul ba): gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir mngon mtshan can gtong bar byed de/ de ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can med pa gtong bar byed de/ de ltar
153b6('dul ba): byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar
153b7('dul ba): byed do/ /de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can ma yin par gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i
153b8('dul ba): phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/ 'di ltar mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/
154a1('dul ba): kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong
154a2('dul ba): bar byed do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i phyir
154a3('dul ba): ma byas pa dang ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed na shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/ bsam pa ni ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni ci
154a4('dul ba): yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems shes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
154a5('dul ba): 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs
154a6('dul ba): pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag khyed mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bden nam / btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
154a7('dul ba): sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du
154a8('dul ba): mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma
154b1('dul ba): bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag
154b2('dul ba): gam/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba ni rnam pa du ma'o/ /byed na zhes bya ba ni kun tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / bun 'gyed par byed pa
154b3('dul ba): dang / skyed 'gyed par byed pa lhag par spyod par byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji
154b4('dul ba): ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas yul gyi tha snyad kyi zong kun tu sbyor bar byed cing / de de la shing rta dang gla mi dang / dpang po dang / gro ba dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ sho gam dang la can dang
154b5('dul ba): gru btsas sbyin par byed na ji srid du rnyed pa dag bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas dbyig gam/ gser rab tu sbyor bar byed cing /
154b6('dul ba): de de la dpang po dang / gro ba dang snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa dag bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong
154b7('dul ba): gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nas dang / 'bru'i bun 'gyed par byed cing / de de la gzhal blugs dang / bre'u chung dang / phul dang / dpang po dang / gro ba dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na ji srid du
154b8('dul ba): rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i
155a1('dul ba): tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir bai dUr+ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing / de de la dpang po dang / gro ba dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag
155a2('dul ba): gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas
155a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i lid tsa byi dag gi khang pa dag drug rtseg dang bdun rtseg tu byed do/ /yangs pa can gyi lid rtsu
155a4('dul ba): byi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dag kyang drug rtseg dang bdun rtseg tu byed pas de dag mtho ches pas brtsigs shing brtsigs shing rdib nas sbyin bdag dag gis bsams pa/ bdag cag gson
155a5('dul ba): zhing 'dug ste/ 'tsho zhing sdod pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang dag kyang 'di ltar 'jig na shi ba rnams kyi ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag gis mkhar lan gyi rgyur dge 'dun la mi zad pa dbul bar bya'o snyam nas de dag mi zad
155a6('dul ba): pa thogs te dge slong rnams kyi gan du dong nas phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dag mkhar len gyi slad du mi zad pa 'di dag bzhes shig /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/
155a7('dul ba): bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
155a8('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar las gyi rgyu mi zad par blangs bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni sum rtseg tu bya'o dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyar khang ni
155b1('dul ba): nyis rtseg tu bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mi zad pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go/ /sbyin bdag dag 'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang gi mkhar lan mi
155b2('dul ba): bgyid kar sha pa Na dag med do/ /'o na bdag cag gis khyed la mi zad pa dag ma phul lam/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ci kho bo cag gis mi zad pa dag zos snyam 'am/ dge 'dun gyi mdzod na 'dug go/ /'phags pa dag de
155b3('dul ba): lta na mi zad par mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar zad par 'gyur te ci bdag cag gi sdum pa na gnas ma mchis snyam 'am/ ci'i slad du rab tu sbyor bar mi mdzad/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba
155b4('dul ba): mdzad pas bdag cag rab tu sbyor bar mi mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa rab tu sbyor bar bya'o/ /
155b5('dul ba): de bzhin du bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa 'bul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa
155b6('dul ba): rab tu sbyor bar bya zhing de las skyed gang grub pa des sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod par bya'o/ /de dag gis de dag nyid la byin nas de dag la 'das pa na rtsod par byed cing / 'phags pa
155b7('dul ba): dag ci'i phyir bdag nyid kyi nor las rtsod pa byung zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
155b8('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis phyug po dag la byin nas/ de dag la 'das pa na mthu dang ldan pa la rten cing
156a1('dul ba): mi ster ba dang / bla'i grwa'i mthus mi ster nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis dbul po rnams la byin nas de dag gis kyang 'jal mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
156a2('dul ba): bka' stsa pa/ gta' nyi rir blangs te dpang po dang bcas pa'i dam rgya'i glegs bu bris te sbyin par bya'o/ /glegs bu de la yang lo dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / dge skos dang / len pa po dang / rdzas dang / skyed rnams
156a3('dul ba): kyi ming bri bar bya'o/ /gang la sbyin par bya ba dge bsnyen dad pa can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba la yang gta' nyi ri kho nas sbyin par bya'o/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /mngon mtshan
156a4('dul ba): can gyis spyod pa'i spang ba ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par
156a5('dul ba): byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ 'tshong bar byed do/ ji ltar len par byed ce na/ gang gi tshe ljongs su lo legs shing grong khyer du lo nyes pa de'i tshe na ljongs nas grong khyer du len par byed de/ de ltar len par byed do/ ji ltar gtong bar byed ce na/ gang gi
156a6('dul ba): tshe grong khyer du lo legs shing ljongs su lo nyes pa de'i tshe na grong khyer nas ljongs su gtong bar byed de/ de ltar gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar nyo bar byed ce na/ gang gi tshe rin chung ba de'i tshe na nyo bar byed de / de ltar nyo bar byed do/ /ji ltar 'tshong bar byed ce na/
156a7('dul ba): gang gi tshe rin che ba de'i tshe na 'tshong bar byed de/ de ltar 'tshong bar byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/ 'di ltar nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/
156a8('dul ba): gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ 'tshong bar byed cing bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ 'tshong bar byed na shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag la bye brag ni ci
156b1('dul ba): yod/ bsam pa ni ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems shes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /
156b2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga
156b3('dul ba): ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ 'tshong bar byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
156b4('dul ba): kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong
156b5('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab
156b6('dul ba): pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /nyo 'tshong rnam pa
156b7('dul ba): sna tshogs shes bya ba ni rnam pa mang po'o/ /byed na zhes bya ba ni len par byed pa dang / gtong bar byed pa dang / nyo bar byed pa dang / 'tshong bar byed pa dag lhag par spyod par byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs
156b8('dul ba): nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed/ 'tshong bar byed na nyo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ 'tshong ba
157a1('dul ba): la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ 'tshong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed
157a2('dul ba): cing rnyed pa 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na nyo bar byed pa la ltung ba med la/ 'tshong bar byed pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na gnyis ka la ltung ba med do/ /
157a3('dul ba): yul gzhan gyi sbyor bas snga ma'i rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa
157a4('dul ba): brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na byang lam pa'i tshong pa lam gyi bgrod par zhugs pa dag gis gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ mig dang snying 'phrog
157a5('dul ba): pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa dag mthong nas de dag dad par gyur te/ de dag gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dag bdag cag gis dge 'dun la mchod ston bgyi'o/ /dge slong
157a6('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ mchod ston gyi yo byad dag khyer te sheg shig /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag blo bur du lhags pa dag lags te/ 'di ltar bdag cag rin 'bul gyis khyed kyis 'bras dag stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis
157a7('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag 'bras dag mi 'tshong ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar gang dag dge
157a8('dul ba): 'dun gyi phyir mchod ston byed pa de la rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dag ri ba kho na sbyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gtsug lag khang de nyid du mchod ston byed pa de la 'theb dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
157b1('dul ba): rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o zhes bca' ba mdzad pas mang po dag mchod ston byed nas thams cad la byin na 'bras dag spyad pas spyi bungs chad par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
157b2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar rin des 'bras gzhan dag nyo bar bya'o/ /'bras rnying pa dag kyang so sor brtags nas gal te srog chags med na dus su btsongs te 'bras sar pas bang ba dag dgang bar bya'o/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang /
157b3('dul ba): sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /nyo 'tshong byed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu pa rdzogs s+ho// // sdom la/ lhung bzed gnyis dang tha ga gnyis/ /byin 'phrog ston zla tha chungs dang / /dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang / /bsngos
157b4('dul ba): pa dang ni gsog 'jog go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon
157b5('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis khyab par byas pas phyin cad gang nas kyang rnyed pa bslang bar mi nus so snyam nas de de snyam sems pa na dga' 'dun drug bcu bskyed mos tshal du dong ba de dag nye dgas mthong ngo / /
157b6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di dag las rnyed pa ma grub na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming gzung bar mi bya'o snyam mo/ /drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag
157b7('dul ba): cag gis rang gi sha dag bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems la/ gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so snyam du sems so/ /gal te ngan song gi gtam
157b8('dul ba): dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyes so snyam du sems pa yin pas des lhung bzed gsal ba/ zlum pa longs spyad par bzod pa mchan khung gis khyer te dga' 'dun de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dga' 'dun
158a1('dul ba): pa gcig la ci nas kyang de'i sems mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i gtam byas nas des mas dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa ci'i slad du byon/ nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bdag la lhung bzed dgos so/ /
158a2('dul ba): 'phags pa bdag la lhung bzed ma mchis te gal te rin gyis rnyed na bdag gis mjal te gsol lo/ /nye dgas lhung bzed mchan khung nas phyung ste de la bstan nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs lhung bzed 'di yang rin gyis rnyed pa yin no/ /
158a3('dul ba): 'phags pa 'di'i rin ji tsam/ kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'o/ /bdag gis 'di'i rin kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'bul lo/ /bzhin bzangs a rog khya de dag khyod kyir gyur cig /sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor
158a4('dul ba): gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog 'thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du snod tu 'gyur bar gyur cig /de bzhin du de des dga' 'dun drug bcu po dag re re yang kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu drug bcu sbyor du bcug nas song ngo / /dga' 'dun de dag
158a5('dul ba): thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas de na dga' 'dun gcig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bos btsun pa nye dga' shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa la lhung bzed kyi
158a6('dul ba): rin du kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu phul gyis rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig / gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bos kyang phul lo / /yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bos kyang phul lo/ /de bzhin du thams cad kyis kho bos kyang phul lo/ /kho bos
158a7('dul ba): kyang phul lo zhes smras nas de dag phan tshun blta bar brtsams te/ shes ldan dag dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du dgos shes de dag gis dge slong zhig la dris pa/ 'phags pa dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du 'tshal/ des smras pa/
158a8('dul ba): bzhin bzangs dag gcig kho na dgos so/ /de dag gis shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams ni rnyed pa 'dod pas zil gyis gnon pa dag yin no zhes smad par brtsams so/ /de ni re shig byung ba yin gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la
158b1('dul ba): nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog
158b2('dul ba): gsog par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/ dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog gsog par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/ dge slong
158b3('dul ba): gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed ces smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs
158b4('dul ba): 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
158b5('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag khyed lhung bzed rnyed do cog sogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/ dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
158b6('dul ba): 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ /rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam
158b7('dul ba): grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs
158b8('dul ba): pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/ /de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong
159a1('dul ba): gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/ /lhung bzed lhag pa zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par bya ba las lhag pa'o/ /zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan bcu'i mtha'i bar du'o/ /bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya'o/ /de las
159a2('dul ba): 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang ba'o/ /spang ba'i lhung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur
159a3('dul ba): zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par
159a4('dul ba): bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par brtag par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la lhung bzed ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis
159a5('dul ba): sam/ tshes gsum mam/ tshes dgu 'am/ tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/
159a6('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis
159a7('dul ba): tshes la lhung bzed cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan zhig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /
159a8('dul ba): yang na phyi ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am gzhan la sbyin pa bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam gtong bar mi byed dam rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu
159b1('dul ba): gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes dang / tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang tshes bcu tshun chad kyi lhung bzed cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma btang bar bya
159b2('dul ba): ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na phyi ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam gtong bar mi byed dam/
159b3('dul ba): rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par
159b4('dul ba): bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag bar bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar
159b5('dul ba): na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la lhung bzed gnyis ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ tshes gsum mam/ tshes dgu 'am/ tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang
159b6('dul ba): du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na
159b7('dul ba): nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la lhung bzed gnyis ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ tshes gsum mam/ tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed
159b8('dul ba): de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/
160a1('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la lhung bzed gzhan gnyis rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po
160a2('dul ba): de nyid kyi nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na phyi ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/
160a3('dul ba): rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du
160a4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /tshes dang / tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang / tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gnyis btang bar
160a5('dul ba): bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la byin par bya'o/ /yang na phyi ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob
160a6('dul ba): par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed mang po rnyed na dge
160a7('dul ba): slong des lhung bzed de dag zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed
160a8('dul ba): dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcug gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la lhung bzed mang po ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ tshes gsum mam/ tshes dgu 'am/
160b1('dul ba): tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par
160b2('dul ba): mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la
160b3('dul ba): yang gzhan mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis
160b4('dul ba): brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi
160b5('dul ba): ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /tshes dang / tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang / tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du
160b6('dul ba): snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag gtang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/
160b7('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed spang
160b8('dul ba): bar 'gyur na de ma spangs shing dbral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan shig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags
161a1('dul ba): par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la/ ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/ /de bzhin du dge
161a2('dul ba): slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ dra ba 'am/ phor bu 'am/ ska rags sam/ dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog
161a3('dul ba): par byed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhung bzed chung ngu dang / lhung bzed skya ba dang / lhung bzed che ba dang / lhung bzed ma tshos pa 'chang ba la ltung ba med do/ /rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa'i don du ltung bzed 'chang ba la thams
161a4('dul ba): cad du ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do / /lhung bzed 'chang ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
161a5('dul ba): mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin du gsal ba/ dbyibs legs pa/ longs spyad par bzod
161a6('dul ba): pa zhig rnyed do/ /bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas des bsod snyoms brgyus te srang du phyin pa dang / spos 'tshong gi khye'u
161a7('dul ba): des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis lhung bzed shin du gsal ba/ dbyibs legs pa/ longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed kyis gal te bzhed na snoms shig bzhin bzangs bdag la ltung bzed yod
161a8('dul ba): do/ /'phags pa gal te dge slong gzhan 'ga' zhig lhung bzed 'tshal ba mchis na de btang du gsol/ btang bar bya'o/ /de nas bsod snyoms pa des mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas rgyal
161b1('dul ba): byed kyi tshal du song ste/ des zan zos nas lhung bzed 'khru ba na dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag srang ga ge mo zhig na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin du gsal ba/ dbyibs legs pa/
161b2('dul ba): longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed kyis khyed cag las gang lhung bzed 'dod pa de song shig /de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na nye dga' 'dug pa des thos nas des bsams pa/ de lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis
161b3('dul ba): thos nas rab tu rgyug par gyur na mi rung gis smad par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod dad pas byin pa zos nas lhung bzed kyi gtam dang / chos gos kyi gtam las gzhan pa'i gtam 'ga' yang med mod/
161b4('dul ba): des bsams pa/ 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed pa de dag dang nye dga' mtshungs pa yin na 'dis kyang re shig bdag smad par gyur na gal te dge slong gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos par gyur na des rgya
161b5('dul ba): cher smad par 'gyur ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /nye dgas de bkar te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po dang kho bo bshes pas de'i phyir khyod smad kyis ma gshe shig /gnas brtan gal te bdag yang smra
161b6('dul ba): bar gyur na khyod kyis bdag la yang smad par mdzod cig / tshe dang ldan pa kho bo yang nye bar ma zhi ba tsam du zad kyi ci lhung bzed de lhung bzed ma yin nam/ gnas brtan snga ma nyid kyang smra bar mi bgyi ba lags kyis 'tshal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa de
161b7('dul ba): lta mod kyi 'on kyang re shig smros shig / gnas brtan srang che ge mo zhig na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig mchis pa des lhung bzed shin du gsal ba/ dbyibs legs pa/ longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed nas de'i mchid nas
161b8('dul ba): gal te dge slong lhung bzed 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig mchis na de btang du gsol zhes mchi'o/ /de ni de tsam du zad de/ de yang nye bar ma zhi ba tsam kho nar zad do/ /de nas nye dga' snam sbyar gyon te 'gros bskyed nas phya ra ra song ba dang / spos
162a1('dul ba): 'tshong gi khye'u des de 'gros bskyed de 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa/ dge sbyong hral pa 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'dis bdag gi lhung bzed 'di phrogs par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas des lhung bzed
162a2('dul ba): de blangs te mdzod tshe'i 'og tu bcug ste bzhag pa dang nye dgas de sbed pa'i tshe mthong nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ci lhung bzed 'di nal gyi bu yin nam ci na de phyir sbed par byed ces des lag pa brkyang ste lhung bzed blangs nas smras
162a3('dul ba): pa/ bzhin bzangs a rog khya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnam 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod tu 'gyur bar gyur cig /'phags pa bdag cag tshong
162a4('dul ba): pa dag ni khe spogs 'tshal bas 'tsho ba lags pas 'di rin ma mchis par mi dbul te 'di ltar rin gyi phyir 'bul lo/ /bzhin bzangs ci khyod drang srong gi snod 'tshong bar byed dam/ tshigs su bcad pa yang smras pa/ gal te
162a5('dul ba): skyes bu sa snod kyis/ /gser gyi snod ni thob gyur na/ /de yis mya ngan ci phyir bya/ /bslus pa med par kho bos mthong / /'phags pa khyod mang du gsung mod kyi 'on kyang rin ma mchis par mi 'bul lo/ /nye dgas smras pa/ khyod kyi
162a6('dul ba): lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis yi dags lko lba can dag gi nang du skye bar bya dgos so zhes de de skad spyo bar byed pa na khyim bdag cig phyogs der 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa nye dga' phyag
162a7('dul ba): 'tshal lo/ /nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phyag skam po 'dis ci bya/ 'phags pa bdag la btsun pa nye dgas bka' stsal pa gang zhig bdag gis ma bsgrubs/ lhung bzed 'di nyos te byin cig /khyim bdag des
162a8('dul ba): spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs/ lhung bzed 'di rin ci tsam/ 'di dang 'di tsam mo/ /kho bos khyod la sbyin no/ /spos 'tshong gi khye'u des lhung bzed de khyim bdag de la byin nas khyim bdag des kyang nye dga'
162b1('dul ba): la phul lo nye dgas smras pa/ a rog khya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod tu 'gyur bar gyur cig /khyim bdag
162b2('dul ba): de song ba dang / nye dgas spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis nye dgas lhung bzed kyi rin sbyor du 'jud mi nus snyam du shes sam/ khyod kyi lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis yi dags lba ba can dag gi nang du skye bar
162b3('dul ba): bya dgos so/ /'phags pa ci zhig sbyor mchis/ khyod kyis kyang lhung bzed thob la/ bdag gis kyang rin thob kyis bzhud cig /nye dga' yang lhung bzed khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des lhung bzed de dge slong rnams la bstan te smras pa/
162b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag ltos shig /kho bo'i lhung bzed ci 'dra/ gzhon nu zhig gis smras pa/ gnas brtan ci khyod la lhung bzed gzhan ma mchis sam/ yod do/ /'o na gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan
162b5('dul ba): btsal du rung ngam/ dgra bo rnams kyi gre bar rkang pas mnan nas so/ /gnas brtan la dgra bo dag kyang mchis sam/ gang gi phyir khyod kho bo'i lhung bzed gnyis pa yang mi bzod pas je khyod kho bo'i dgra bo thu bo yin no/ /
162b6('dul ba): dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol bar byed ces smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
162b7('dul ba): gsol to de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du
162b8('dul ba): rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/ nye dga' khyod lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol ba bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/
163a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan
163a2('dul ba): 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/
163a3('dul ba): bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas bsod snyoms pa zhig gi lhung bzed cung zhig rdol nas des de thogs
163a4('dul ba): te mnyan yod tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang des phye dag rnyed nas des de dag lhung bzed kyi snod kyis mnos so/ /'bras can gsher ba rnyed nas des de dag lhung bzed kyis mnos pa dang de nas zags pas phye dag gsher bar
163a5('dul ba): gyur te de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod ma rung bar gyur nas de sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa dang / de la khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pas nor can dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon dag bzhin du
163a6('dul ba): 'khor mang por 'gyur ba'i las byas pas sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing bzhud do/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de mthong nas smras pa/ byis pa dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa la tho 'tsham par byed/
163a7('dul ba): khyim bdag 'phags pa la tho btsam du ci mchis/ 'phags pas nor can dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon dag bzhin du 'khor mang po 'gyur ba'i las bgyis pas sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing bzhud do/ /
163a8('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dge slong de la smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa kun du mdzes pa la khyod ci cal col byed/ khyim bdag 'di la cal col du gyur pa ci yod/ khyod kyis kho bo
163b1('dul ba): rol mo mkhan gyi khyim dang / 'jud 'thun ma'i khyim dang / chang pa'i khyim dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / gdol pa'i khyim du zhugs par mthong ngam/ 'phags pa 'o na ci'i phyir khyod byis pa dag gis bskor te
163b2('dul ba): 'phags par byed/ khyim bdag kho bo'i lhung bzed 'di zag go/ /'o na ci'i phyir lhung bzed gzhan mi tshol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar
163b3('dul ba): mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di 'dra ba yod cing bdog pa yin nam zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
163b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ gang gi lhung bzed rdol ba des klan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi lhung bzed rdol ba des klan par bya'o zhes bca' ba mdzad nas/ dge slong dag lhan pa snyi ba lnga po bu ram dang / rgya skyegs kyi
163b5('dul ba): tshigs ma dang / spra tshil dang / ro nye dang / tshon mo steng dag gis klon par byed nas/ de dag tsha ba dang phrad nas yang zags par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
163b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan pa snyi ba lnga po de dag spangs te lhan pa sra ba lnga po gzhan dag gis klan par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis lhan pa sra ba lnga po dag ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa/ lhan rings
163b7('dul ba): dang / tham phran dang / lhan pa dang / chu srin gyi so lta bu dang / phye mas so/ /dge slong rnams kyis phye ma du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /phye ma gnyis te/ lcags kyi phye ma dang / rdo'i phye
163b8('dul ba): ma'o/ /lcags kyi lhung bzed la ni lcags kyi phye mas bklan par bya'o/ /sa'i lhung bzed la ni rdo'i phye mas bklan par bya'o/ /de dag chur phye ma bdar te klon par byed nas de de bzhin du 'gogs nas bcom
164a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'bru mar du bdar bas bklan par bya'o/ /de dag ha cang drag tu sreg pas de 'gogs pa dang / ha cang chung ngur sros pas mi 'chags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
164a2('dul ba): ci ran tsam du bsro bar bya'o/ /ha cang rtsub por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdar bar bya'o/ /de dag chus blugs te bdar bar byed pas de yang 'gogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
164a3('dul ba): 'bru mar blugs te bdar bar bya'o/ /sa las byas pa'i lhung bzed dag rdol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu ram dang / 'jim pas klan nas de dag bsro bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar lhan pa lnga po
164a4('dul ba): dag gis bklan par bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad nas/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig gis sa las byas pa'i lhung bzed lag pa nas shor te gyo dum lngar gyur nas/ des de dag bu gu phug ste gyo dum dag skud pas brgyus nas bsod
164a5('dul ba): snyoms la rgyu bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed la zas med par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas des de rung bar byed pa na bshig cing rgyud par byed pas snga dro thams cad zad par gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la
164a6('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ci khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs 'di lta ste/ bcings pa 'grol ba 'di kho na yin nam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed chag pa la lhan pa sra ba lnga po dag gis klan par
164a7('dul ba): bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la
164a8('dul ba): yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ dge slong rnams la de dang rjes su 'thun pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta
164b1('dul ba): bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par
164b2('dul ba): bya ste/ yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa/ spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar
164b3('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/ gtang bar mi bya/ gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du khad kyis dal bu dal
164b4('dul ba): bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste/ de la de ni cho ga yin no/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/ /lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed lhan pa lngar ma tshang ba'o/ /spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du zhes bya ba ni yongs su longs spyad par
164b5('dul ba): bzod pa yod bzhin du'o/ /bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mchog 'dod pa'i phyir ram/ yang dang yang 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /lhung bzed sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te gsar pas sar pa dang / rnyed pas sar pa ste/ don 'dir ni gnyis
164b6('dul ba): ka yin par dgongs so/ /gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o/ /tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni tshol bar byed cing ngo / /lhung bzed grub na zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed thob na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung
164b7('dul ba): byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /dge slong des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /lhung bzed de zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa de'o/ /dge slong
164b8('dul ba): gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa la'o/ /dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/
165a1('dul ba): btang bar mi bya/ gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste zhes bya ba la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang lhung bzed 'brel pa
165a2('dul ba): med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro
165a3('dul ba): ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa'o/ /lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brims pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang
165a4('dul ba): bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brims pa dang ma brims
165a5('dul ba): pa shes pa'o/ /'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/ rje dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro 'am/ gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu des gnas
165a6('dul ba): mal bsham pa byas te/ gaN DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo ste/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /
165a7('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang
165a8('dul ba): bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bsko'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
165b1('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro ste/ de'i slad tu dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan
165b2('dul ba): pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge
165b3('dul ba): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par skos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ngas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i
165b4('dul ba): chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis tshogs pa'i dus su dge 'dun la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag sang dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag
165b5('dul ba): nang par gaN DI brdungs pa na rang rang gi lhung bzed dag thogs la dge 'dun gyi nang du gshegs par mdzod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis phyi de nyin par gnas mal bsham pa byas te/
165b6('dul ba): gaN DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi lhung bzed dag byin gyis brlabs pa phyung zhing thogs te dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/ /
165b7('dul ba): de nas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa thogs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi
165b8('dul ba): mdun du 'dug ste/ gnas brtan lhung bzed 'di ni shin du gsal ba/ dbyibs legs pa/ longs spyad par bzod pa lags kyis gal te bzhed na snoms shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa'i sngags pa
166a1('dul ba): brjod de dbul bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kyang gal te 'dod na blang bar bya'o/ /gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed de blangs na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas
166a2('dul ba): brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /gnas brtan gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyi sar bu
166a3('dul ba): la dbul ba'i bar du bya'o/ /gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma blangs na gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /gal te gnas brtan gnyis pas ma blangs na gnas brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /gal te gnas
166a4('dul ba): brtan gsum pas ma blangs na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan slong bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi 'dul
166a5('dul ba): ba dang 'ga' ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas ma blangs na gsar bu gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /gal te gsar bu gnyis pas ma blangs na gsar bu la dbul bar bya'o/ /
166a6('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyi gsar bus blangs pa na gsar bu gsum pa slong bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing / brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum
166a7('dul ba): pas 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i bar du bya'o/ /dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/ gtang
166a8('dul ba): bar mi bya/ gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya'o/ /lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad par bya ba'i chos ji
166b1('dul ba): ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /ngas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun du spyad par bya ba'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa
166b2('dul ba): 'chang ba'i dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya zhing de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing / cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/ /des lhung
166b3('dul ba): bzed gnyi ga thogs te bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel pa med pas blang bar bya'o/ /gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pas blang bar bya'o/ /gtsug
166b4('dul ba): lag khang du 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor byas te lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa mdun du bzhag nas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs par bza' bar bya'o/ /zos zin nas byi dor dang / kha zas 'bags pa'i dril phyi bya ba yang dang por lhung
166b5('dul ba): bzed 'brel pa med pa la bya zhing / de'i 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa la bya'o/ /bkru ba dang / bskam pa dang / lci bas brud pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /gal te lhung bzed kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der
166b6('dul ba): lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing / cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/ /gal te ngos khung gcig yod la gal te shod bzang na shod tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing / ngos khung
166b7('dul ba): du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/ /gal te ngos khung bzang na ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing / shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /lhung bzed kyi las byed pa na gal te rdza bo
166b8('dul ba): gnyis yod na rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bsreg par bya zhing / cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bsreg par bya'o/ /gal te rdza bo gcig yod na gal te 'og ma legs par tshos par 'gyur na 'og tu lhung
167a1('dul ba): bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing / steng du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gal te steng du bzhag pa legs par chos par 'gyur na steng du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing / 'og tu lhung
167a2('dul ba): bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /lam du 'gro ba na lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis bskur bar bya ste/ de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing / cig shos su lhung zed byin gyis brlabs pa
167a3('dul ba): gzhug par bya'o/ /gal te khur tsha ba 'ga' zhig yod na de la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bskur bar bya zhing / bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bskur bar bya'o/ /gal te khur tsha ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g.yon pas lhung
167a4('dul ba): bzed 'brel pa med pa bskur bar bya zhing / phrag pa g.yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bskur bar bya'o/ /'di ni re shig chad pa'i las yin te tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su srung bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya'o/ /lhung
167a5('dul ba): bzed 'brel pa med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'ga' tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su 'thun pa'i
167a6('dul ba): yin pa'o/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gcig gis klan par 'os shing ma klan la spyad pa yin na/ de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol ba la nyes
167a7('dul ba): byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gnyis kyis klan par 'os shing ma klan la spyad bzod pa yin na/ de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba
167a8('dul ba): la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gsum gyis klan par 'os shing ma klan la spyad bzod pa yin na/ de la lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed
167b1('dul ba): sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa bzhis slan par 'os shing ma klan la spyad bzod pa yin na/ de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa
167b2('dul ba): de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gcig gis klan par 'os shing klan la spyad bzod pa yin na/
167b3('dul ba): de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gnyis kyis klan par 'os shing klan
167b4('dul ba): la spyad bzod pa yin na/ de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gsum gyis klan
167b5('dul ba): par 'os shing klan la spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa bzhis klan par 'os shing
167b6('dul ba): klan la spyad bzod pa yin na/ de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi lhung bzed chag
167b7('dul ba): cing lhan pa lngas klan par 'os pa yin na de des klan kyang rung / ma klan kyang rung / spyad bzod kyang rung / spyad mi bzod kyang rung / lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la yang ltung ba med la/ thob na yang
167b8('dul ba): ltung ba med do/ /rin gyis len pa dang / brje bas len pa la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu //
168a1('dul ba): gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ 'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon
168a2('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas phyin chad ras yug phran sbom po cig gi rin yang gang las kyang bslang bar mi nus kyis/ song ste bltas la gal te la la las bslang bar nus kyang srid do snyam nas
168a3('dul ba): de snga dro sham thams bgos lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu shar sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bskyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong
168a4('dul ba): nas bsams pa/ 'di dag ni las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/ nyin mtshan du thong gshol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la sgyur dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas des
168a5('dul ba): de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag a rog khya/ a rog khya/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang des de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang /
168a6('dul ba): skye bo mang po'i yid tu mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ba 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur bas khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smrar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /de na gzhon nu ma bsod
168a7('dul ba): nams 'dod pa cig 'dug pa des stan las langs te nye dga'i stan bting ba dang / nye dga' de la 'dug nas des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/ /nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed
168a8('dul ba): cag la dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/ 'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so/ /sring mo dag ma legs so/ /bu mo 'dis ni re shig dge ba'i chos gnyis byas shing bsags te/
168b1('dul ba): 'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/ /'dis kho bo la mngon du ldang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang / phyag byas pa gang yin
168b2('dul ba): pa des ni 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/ /gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no/ /sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshis dag ga las 'byung /
168b3('dul ba): 'phags pa sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/ /gos dag ga las 'byung / sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/ /khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/ 'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma
168b4('dul ba): mchis so sring mo dag ma legs so ma legs so/ /'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/ khyed cag la ste/ khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la/ 'di nas bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu
168b5('dul ba): 'gro bar byed do/ /'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi ba'i shul rgyags cung zad bskur ba'i thabs ci mchis/ sring mo dag gal te khyed kyis dge sbyong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod
168b6('dul ba): gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrogs pa/ rigs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen po skon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /
168b7('dul ba): 'phags pa bdag gis dge slong de lta bu ga las rnyed/ sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrogs pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs dang ldan pa yin par mi shes
168b8('dul ba): sam/ 'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor pa ga las mchis/ sring mo dag khyed kyis/ bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya/ /de ni bdag la mi 'ong min/ /chu yi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis/ /snod chen
169a1('dul ba): gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni/ /cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs/ /zhes bya ba de mi shes sam/ khyed kyis re shig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/ rngo thog go/ /gzhan zhig
169a2('dul ba): gis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang phyed dbul lo/ /gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang gi bzhi cha cig dbul lo/ /de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar khas blangs so/ /nye dgas smras pa/
169a3('dul ba): sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig /'phags pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so/ /bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo/ /sring mo dag de je bos shig /de dag gis de bos pa dang /
169a4('dul ba): nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo je dog pa phrar khol cig /des phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig /des de bas kyang phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas yang dang yang du bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol
169a5('dul ba): cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo mi thog go/ /nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig /'phags pa bdag cag gis dog
169a6('dul ba): pa 'di 'dra ba 'khal du rngo mi thog go/ /bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam ci/ khyed cag gis 'di'i don du 'khol la 'di khyed cag gi don du 'khal du chug shig /'phags pa gal te btub na'o/ nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo gyis shig dang
169a7('dul ba): khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra ba dar che ba lags pas yun ring mos bka' 'tshal gyis ha cang ngos drag tu ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig /nye dgas de la a rog khya zhes smras nas stan
169a8('dul ba): las langs te song ngo / /bde gnas ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo/ /nye dgas de dag la a rog khya sbyin pa 'dis khyed
169b1('dul ba): sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo / /de nas nye dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang
169b2('dul ba): du song nas/ des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo / /gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i thag pa 'ga' btsal
169b3('dul ba): ba mchis sam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyis nye dga' zil gyis gnon tam/ gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan gal zil gyis
169b4('dul ba): gnon/ 'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug mchis te/ gal te des dog pa 'di rnyed tu lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bu dag a rog khya don gyis na khyed kyis kho
169b5('dul ba): bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang / des tha ga pa de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba/ /gangs dang
169b6('dul ba): ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin/ /mi mkhas rab tu mi snang ba/ /mun pa'i nang du mda' 'phangs bzhin/ /bzhin bzangs khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /
169b7('dul ba): dog pa 'di ci 'dra je ltos shig /'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo / /dog pa ni 'di lags la tha ga pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzangs thogs shig /'phags pa bdag
169b8('dul ba): la thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur/ bzhin bzangs khyod rtag pa nyid tu thags glas mi ngoms sam/ 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags kyang bskur bar gyis shig /de la chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras 'dis thag ring po
170a1('dul ba): kho na nas bdag cag gnyis kyi bsngags pa brjod kyis 'di'i ras yug chen thogs shig / 'phags pa dog pa 'di phra ba dar che ba lags kyis yun 'di tsam na spyon cig /nye dgas a rog khya zhes smras te song ngo / /tha ga pa des
170a2('dul ba): ras yug chen de dus de tsam gyis btags so/ /nye dgas yang dus de tsam gyis der song ba dang tha ga pa des de la ras yug chen de phul lo/ /nye dgas de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des dge slong rnams la ras yug chen de bstan te smras
170a3('dul ba): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i ras yug chen ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan ras yug chen bzang ngo / /'di ltar gang la 'di lta bu gnyis pa yang mchis pa de ni sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim du bgyis te dge ba'i phyogs la snying las chung ngus tron
170a4('dul ba): bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyod kyi snying lam na nye dgas ras yug chen 'di 'dra ba gnyis sbyor du 'jud mi nus snyam 'am/ ji ltar sbyor du 'jud pa ltos shig /de nas nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung
170a5('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu nub sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di dag ni
170a6('dul ba): las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/ nyin mtshan du thong gshol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la sgyur dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas des de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag
170a7('dul ba): a rog khya/ a rog khya/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang / skye bo mang po'i yid tu mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams
170a8('dul ba): cad dang thun mong ba 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur bas khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smrar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa cig 'dug pa des stan
170b1('dul ba): las langs te nye dga'i stan bting ba dang nye dga' de la 'dug nas des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/ /nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag la dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad
170b2('dul ba): yod dam/ 'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so/ /sring mo dag ma legs so/ /bu mo 'dis ni re shig dge ba'i chos gnyis byas shing bsags te/ 'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis phyug por 'gyur
170b3('dul ba): ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/ /'dis kho bo la mngon du ldang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/ /gal te cung zad sbyin par
170b4('dul ba): byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no/ /sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshis dag ga las 'byung 'phags pa sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/ /gos dag ga las 'byung / sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/ /khyed cag gis 'jig
170b5('dul ba): rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/ 'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad tu ma mchis so/ /sring mo dag ma legs so ma legs so/ /'phags pa su la thugs
170b6('dul ba): ngan mdzad/ khyed cag la ste/ khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la/ 'di nas kyang bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro bar byed do/ /'phags pa gang gis bdag
170b7('dul ba): cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du mchi ba'i shul rgyags cung zad bskur ba'i thabs ci mchis/ sring mo dag gal te khyed kyis dge slong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrogs pa/ rigs
170b8('dul ba): pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong de lta bu
171a1('dul ba): ga las rnyed/ sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrogs pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam 'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug
171a2('dul ba): chen gyi 'byor pa ga las mchis/ sring mo dag khyed kyis/ bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya/ /de ni bdag la mi 'ong min/ /chu yi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis/ /snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni/ /
171a3('dul ba): cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs/ /zhes bya ba de mi shes sam/ khyed kyis re shig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/ rngo thog go/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang phyed dbul lo/ /gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/
171a4('dul ba): bdag gis kyang srang gi bzhi cha cig dbul lo/ /de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar khas blangs so/ /nye dgas smras pa/ sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig /'phags pa bdag cag thams cad
171a5('dul ba): ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so/ /bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo/ /sring mo dag de je bos shig /de dag gis de bos pa dang nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo je dog pa phrar khol cig /des phrar bkal
171a6('dul ba): ba dang nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig /des de bas kyang phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas yang dang yang du bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di las phra bar
171a7('dul ba): ni rngo mi thog go/ /nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig /'phags pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra ba 'khal du rngo mi thog go/ /bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus
171a8('dul ba): sam ci khyed cag gis 'di'i don du 'khol la/ 'di khyed cag gi don du 'khal du chug shig /'phags pa gal te btub na'o/ /nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo gyis shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /
171b1('dul ba): 'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra ba dar che ba lags pas yun ring mos bkal 'tshal gyis ha cang dos drag par ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig /nye dgas de la a rog khya zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo / /
171b2('dul ba): bde gnas ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo/ /nye dgas de dag la a rog khya/ sbyin pa 'dis khyed sems kyi rgyan dang /
171b3('dul ba): sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo / /de nas nye dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des
171b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa 'di ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo / /gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i tha ga pa 'ga' btsal ba mchis
171b5('dul ba): sam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyis nye dga' zil gyis gnon tam/ gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan ga la zil gyis gnon/ 'di ltar
171b6('dul ba): ra ba ga ge mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug mchis te/ gal te des dog pa 'di rnyed tu lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bu dag a rog khya de don gyis na khyed kyis kho bo'i ras yug
171b7('dul ba): chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang / des tha ga pa de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba/ /gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin/ /
171b8('dul ba): mi mkhas rab tu mi snang ba/ /mun pa'i nang du mda' 'phangs bzhin/ /bzhin bzangs khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /dog pa 'di ci 'dra je ltos
172a1('dul ba): shig / 'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo / /dog pa ni 'di lags la tha ga pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzangs 'di yang thogs shig /'phags pa bdag la thags gla sus stsal bar 'gyur/
172a2('dul ba): bzhin bzangs khyod rtag pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam/ 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags kyang bskur bar gyis shig /'phags pa ras yug chen snga med 'thag pa na bdag gis bu lon gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang da dung ma
