172a3('dul ba): 'khor ro/ /des chung ma'i gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang / chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te 'di 'tshal yang bdag ni mi 'tshal lo/ /nye dgas spyos te smras pa/ kwa'i tha ga pa spyi cer nyon cig /kho bos gal te khyod ras yug chen 'di
172a4('dul ba): 'thag tu ma bcug na spyi cer gyi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro/ /tha ga pa des kyang spyos te smras pa/ kwa'i dge sbyong mgo reg nyon cig /kho bo gal te khyod kyi ras yug chen 'thag na mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro/ /nye dgas spyos te song nas ko sa lar byung ba'i
172a5('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang gi yid brten pa che ba zhes bya ba nye dga'i mdza' bo zhig yod de/ nye dga' de'i sdum par song ste/ g.yog 'khor dag la smras pa/ kye nang rje dag che ba gar song / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags
172a6('dul ba): pa srang du mchis so/ /nye dga' de 'ong ba'i srang du song ba dang / che ba chang 'tshong ba'i tshong rdal zhig tu zhugs so/ /nye dga' tshong rdal de'i sgor bsdad de che ba la nye dga' sgo na sdod kyis phyir byung shig ces phrin spring ba dang / che ba phyir byung nas smras
172a7('dul ba): pa/ btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /nye dgas smras pa/ che ba kho bos ko khyod rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag la na rtson par gyur snyam du bsams kyis/ kho bos khyod 'di ltar chang 'tshong ba'i khyim nas chang 'tshong ba'i
172a8('dul ba): khyim du 'phyan par ni ma bsams so/ /'phags pa bdag rgyal po'i dgos pas 'dir zhugs so/ /btsun pa nye dga' byon pa'i dgos pa ci mchis/ che ba dog pa cung zhig rnyed pa 'dis re shig ras yug chen 'thag tu chug shig /bdag gis btsun pa nye dga'
172b1('dul ba): la ras yug chen nyid dbul lo/ /de yang bskur na ci dad pas sbyin par bya ba 'di dor bar bya 'am/ che bas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sna bo'i gan du song la 'phags pa nye dga'i ras yug chen 'di thogs la phul cig ces gyis
172b2('dul ba): shig / nye dgas smras pa/ 'di tha ga pa'i sna bo 'thag tu ma gzhug par 'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo zhig gi drung na thag pa spyi cer khyo shug 'dug pa des 'di btag par bya'o/ /che bas mi de la smras pa/ kye nang rje tha ga pa spyi cer de'i gan du song
172b3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces che ba na re 'di thogs la byin cig ces zer ro zhes gyis shig / mi des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du song ste smras pa/ kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas 'di thogs la byin cig ces gsung ngo / /spyi cer gyis dog pa de
172b4('dul ba): ngo shes nas des smras pa/ bdag gis res khor ro/ /mi de song ste che ba la smras pa/ tha ga pa spyi cer gyi mchid nas bdag gi res khor ro zhes mchi'o/ /che bas smras pa/ kye nang rje spyi cer gyi gan du song la 'di skad ces res gzhan byed tu mi
172b5('dul ba): gzhug go zhes gyis shig / mi de song ste smras pa/ kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas res gzhan byed tu mi gzhug go zhes gsung ngo / /spyi cer gyis smras pa/ kye nang rje che ba mnyan yod tu dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod tu mi gnas par
172b6('dul ba): zad mod/ kho bo skal ba ma yin pa'i las mi byed do/ /mi de che ba'i gan du song ste smras pa/ spyi cer gyi mchid nas che ba mnyan yod tu dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod tu mi gnas par zad mod/ kho bo skal ba ma yin pa'i
172b7('dul ba): las mi byed do zhes mchi'o/ /che bas smras pa/ kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sna bo'i gan du song la dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig ces bgyi shig /nye dgas smras pa/ 'di tha ga pa'i sna bos btag par mi bya bar 'di ltar tha ga
172b8('dul ba): pa spyi cer gyis btag par bya'o/ /che bas mi de la smras pa/ kye nang rje tha ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du song la/ che ba na re skom zong sbyin gyis ras yug chen thogs shig ces
173a1('dul ba): zer ro zhes gyis shig / de 'phags pa nye dgas de la smras pa/ bkren pa khyod su zhig gis rgyal po'i mir bzhag /khyod lcag rgod mang pos brdabs te sa dang shing dag skyed tu gzhug par bya ba yin no/ /tha ga pa spyi cher gyi
173a2('dul ba): gan du song ste 'di skad ces che ba'i zhal nas ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo / /zhes zer mi nus sam/ gal te mi 'thag go zhes zer na thor to dag nas bzung ste khug la khu tshur gyis gtogs shig gal te ngu na thags mi mthun bar
173a3('dul ba): dril cig / gal te de'i chung ma ngu na lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar bya zhing / khyed gnyis kyis che ba'i mchid bcag pas khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i gyod la bsgrin no zhes
173a4('dul ba): brjod par bya'o/ /de lta na kho bo'i ras yug chen yang 'grub par 'gyur la khyod kyis kyang gsug mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de song ste smras pa/ che ba'i zhal nas skom zong sbyin gyis ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo / /spyi cer gyis smras pa/
173a5('dul ba): kho bo skal ba ma yin pa 'thag mi nus so/ /des de'i thor tho dag nas bzung ste bkug nas khu tshur gyis btags so/ /des ngu bar brtsams pa dang / des de'i thags mi mthun bar dril bar brtsams so/ /de'i chung mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / des de'i
173a6('dul ba): lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar brtsams shing khyed gnyis kyis che ba'i mchid bcag pas khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i gyod la bsgrin par byas tshur shog / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes des de gnyis khrid de 'phags pa dang /
173a7('dul ba): chung mas spyi cer la smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te bdag cag gnyis btson rar bcug par gyur na bdag cag gnyis la thar bar byed pa 'ga' yang med pas btson
173a8('dul ba): rar gnod pa dag gis 'chi bar bya dgos kyis ras yug chen 'di thogs shig / spyi cer gyis smras pa/ kye nang po bdag cag rgyal po'i pho brang du ma bkri bar dog pa zhog la bzhud cig dang bdag gis ras yug chen yang btag cing khyod
173b1('dul ba): la yang gsug mang po dbul lo/ /des dog pa bzhag ste song ba dang spyi cher gyis chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo ras yug chen 'di gang gis dog par yang mi rung la ras yug chen du'ang mi rung bar 'gyur ba de ltar btag par bya'o/ /chung mas
173b2('dul ba): smras pa/ rje'i sras de dge sbyong hral po de lta bu yin pas bdag cag gis ras yug chen de lta bur byas na des btang re skan/ des ras yug chen de btags nas de ras yug chen de thags las 'grol zhing 'dug pa na nye dga' yang 'ongs
173b3('dul ba): nas nye dgas ras yug chen de blangs pa dang / spyi cer gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag la skom zong stsol cig /bkren pa kho bo khyod kyi skom zong dbul ba yin nam/ dug ci'i phyir mi brkyud/ nu rdzi ci'i phyir mi brkyud/ de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong
173b4('dul ba): rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ 'di ltar kha'i chos cung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go/ /rgyal po'i pho brang gi mthu cung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer
173b5('dul ba): bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma
173b6('dul ba): bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la smras pa/ nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes
173b7('dul ba): pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya
173b8('dul ba): ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba
174a1('dul ba): la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang rang gis bslangs pa'i
174a2('dul ba): dog pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa las gos 'thag tu 'jud na gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas zhes bya ba ni 'dun
174a3('dul ba): pas la la las srang gcig / la la las srang phyed/ la la las zho gnyis/ la la las zho gcig bslangs pa'i dog pas so/ /tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no/ /nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs las
174a4('dul ba): brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/ /gos 'thag tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang /
174a5('dul ba): ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos la ba gang yang rung ba'o/ /gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags pa bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i
174a6('dul ba): ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/
174a7('dul ba): tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tha ga pa nye du la
174a8('dul ba): 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis
174b1('dul ba): nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du dang nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/ /tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang
174b2('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur
174b3('dul ba): ro tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bdag nyid
174b4('dul ba): kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ tha ga pa nye
174b5('dul ba): du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang
174b6('dul ba): ltung ba med do/ /dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na de slong ba la ltung ba med la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du
174b7('dul ba): ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang ltung ba med do/ /tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis
174b8('dul ba): nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i
175a1('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur ro/ /tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag
175a2('dul ba): tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/ gla rngan gyi 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'thag tu 'jud pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// //
175a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
175a4('dul ba): bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /khyim bdag de dus gzhan zhig na gzhan gyi chung ma la chags par gyur nas de la chung mas rje'i sras de lta ma mdzad cig ces phyir bzlog na/ ji tsam du de phyir bzlog kyang ma log pa de tsam du
175a5('dul ba): de'i chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'khrul ba rtsom par byed do/ /khyim bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/ chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas de ltar khyim de gnyis ka
175a6('dul ba): rgud par gyur nas de gnyis la bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'dis khyim rgud par byas so zhes khu tshur dang / thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do/ /bu mo des smras pa/ bdag gis khyim
175a7('dul ba): rgud par gyur pa 'di ci las gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod par bgyir rung / nye dgas de tshor nas khyim bdag de dang khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i gan du
175a8('dul ba): song ste ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas des
175b1('dul ba): de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so/ /khyim bdag de gtum pa/ brtun ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin pas yang bu mo de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang / chung mas de la smras pa/ rje'i sras gang
175b2('dul ba): gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe go rdeg par mdzad mod/ da bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' la brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas 'di ltar 'jig rten
175b3('dul ba): ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas su zhig su'i bran lags/ bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig /bzang mo khyod zer ba ma nyes so/ /bu mo tshur shog /khrus gyis la shog shig /bu mo de khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang / des de la
175b4('dul ba): gos phrugs gcig bskon nas smras pa/ bu mo dga' zhing las byos shig /bu mo des bsams pa/ khyim bdag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa/ brtun ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin te/ yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis
175b5('dul ba): rdeg par byed cing zas dang gos ngan pa dag sbyin par byed na/ da 'di bdag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam nas/ yang bsams pa/ gang tshun cad nas 'phags pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par brtsams pa de tshun chad nas khyim
175b6('dul ba): bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gis dga' bar bya snyam nas des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di las chung zhig brkus te dbul du ni khyim bdag 'dis
175b7('dul ba): bdag brdeg btsog mang po byas te sngon gyi gnas su bzhag par 'gyur ro snyam nas de sdod cing 'dug go/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig /'phags pa nye dga' ni
175b8('dul ba): bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ 'phags pa nye dgas bdag cag las dri ma can dang phral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/ yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos kyis sdud par byed pas
176a1('dul ba): bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /bzang mo de bzhin bya'o/ /rje'i sras bdag gis dog pa 'jam po bkal te/ dog pa de las tha ga pa che ge mo zhig la ras yug chen 'thag tu stsal cing slad kyis
176a2('dul ba): ras yug chen skon par bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag des dog pa de tha ga pa la byin nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig dang 'phags pa nye dga' la dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar bya'o/ /bu mo des de thos
176a3('dul ba): nas bsams pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran par bya'o snyam mo/ /nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis
176a4('dul ba): bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang / bu mo des khyim legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nas/ des nye dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par
176a5('dul ba): bgyi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la dga' ba ci zhig sbran par bya/ khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag dang bdag
176a6('dul ba): mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrigs so snyam du rig nas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo ci kho bo la tho 'tsham par byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ bdag ci'i slad tu 'phags pa la tho 'tsham par bgyid/ nye dgas
176a7('dul ba): smras pa/ bu mo gal te bden par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe ba dag la chugs ma bya 'o/ /ji ste brdzun par gyur na ni brdeg btsog mang po byed tu bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/ /'phags pa gal te
176a8('dul ba): bdag la thugs mi ches na phyogs ga ge mo zhig na tha ga pa mchis pa der bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /de der song te tha ga pa la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ras yug chen 'thag pa 'di su'i yin/ 'phags pa btsun pa nye
176b1('dul ba): dga'i lags so/ /khyod kyis nye dga' shes sam/ ma 'tshal to/ /de ni kho bo yin no/ /bzhin bzangs srid tu 'di tsam gyis srings shig /'phags pa dog pa sus stsol bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /kho bos kyang khyod la cung
176b2('dul ba): zhig nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /nye dga' phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim du zhugs nas/
176b3('dul ba): des de'i stan bting ba dang / de de la 'dug nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/ /des de la chos bstan nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci lags/ deng spyan drangs sam/ bsod snyoms
176b4('dul ba): mdzad/ bsod snyoms bgyid do/ /des bsams pa su zhig bdag bas bsod snyoms ches bzang ba 'bul bar 'gyur snyam nas des de la hwags kyi la thu dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ /nye dgas de dag blangs te tha ga pa de'i gan
176b5('dul ba): du song nas des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs je lag pa gnyis zed cig des lag pa gnyis bzed pa dang / des de la la thu cig byin nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs je zo shig /des de zos pa dang / des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs la
176b6('dul ba): thu'i ro ci 'dra/ 'phags pa bda'o/ /khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' la thu 'di 'dra ba zos sam/ 'phags pa lan 'ga' yang ma 'tshal to/ /thu ba zed cig /des thu ba bzed pa dang / des de'i thu bar la thu thams cad blugs te
176b7('dul ba): smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di legs par thogs shig /kho bos khyod la phyis kyang la thu chung zad nye bar bsgrub par byas zhing du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig /'phags pa dog pa bas par gyur na sus
176b8('dul ba): stsol bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /des ras yug chen de 'thag pa na dog pa zad nas de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung ma ni med/ khyim bdag ni 'dug
177a1('dul ba): nas thag pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ khyim bdag ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig khyim bdag des byin te btang ngo / /yang 'thag pa na dog pa zad pa nas de yang
177a2('dul ba): khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag ni med khyim bdag gi chung ma ni 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag gi chung ma de la smras pa/ sru ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig /des byin te btang
177a3('dul ba): ngo / /yang 'thag pa na zad nas de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / ci tsam na khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma gnyi ga 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ /khyim bdag yang ras yug chen de btag pa'i
177a4('dul ba): dog pa zad kyis yang dog pa byin cig / khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/ khyim bdag gis chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo ci khyod kyis kyang 'di la dog pa byin nam/ stsal to/ /khyim
177a5('dul ba): bdag gis smras pa/ kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/ tha ga pas smras pa/ khyim bdag ci deng bskyed par brtsams snyam 'am/ nyi ma gang kho na la btsun pa nye dga' mchis nas 'di skad ces srid tu 'di tsam gyis srings
177a6('dul ba): shig / zheng du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig ces mchi ba'i nyi ma de kho na la bskyed par brtsams so/ /khyim bdag gi chung mas bsams pa/ ras yug chen de ci 'dra ji ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang / ji tsam chen po la 'os
177a7('dul ba): pa'i ras yug chen mthong ngo / /de mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang ste smras pa/ kho mos ras yug chen 'di 'phags pa nye dga' la mi byin no/ /kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan zhig 'thag tu gzhug go zhes zer te
177a8('dul ba): song ngo / /nye dga' dus dang dus su der 'ongs nas smras pa/ kye tha ga pa rung ngam/ 'phags pa bdag gi ni rung na khyod kyi ni mi rung ngo / /kye tha ga pa ji ltar gyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gi chung ma mchis par gyur te des ras yug chen mthong nas de'i mig
177b1('dul ba): khrag gis gang ste/ kho mos 'phags pa nye dga' la ras yug chen 'di mi sbyin no/ /kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan 'thag tu gzhug go zhes mchi ste mchis so/ /kye tha ga pa khyod la kho bos cung zhig byas pa yod pa shes sam/ des smras pa
177b2('dul ba): ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bdag da dung yang khyod kyi la thu dag 'tshal zhig mchis so/ /kye tha ga pa gang gi tshe kho bo khyim der 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis ras yug chen 'di khyer shog shig /'phags pa je bzhud cig dang bdag gis
177b3('dul ba): kyang kha tshar bkal te mchi'o/ /nye dga' de'i khyim du song ste sgo'i thad kar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te kha sgor lta zhing mdun du 'dug go/ /tha ga pa des kyang ras yug chen de'i kha tshar dril nas de khyer
177b4('dul ba): te der song ba dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma des de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des lag brdas ma 'ong shig ces byas pa dang / tha ga pa des phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas ltos bzung bas mgo smad de nang du zhugs nas
177b5('dul ba): des ras yug chen de khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i pang du bzhag pa dang / nye dgas tsham tshom med par blangs te smras pa/ a rog khya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /
177b6('dul ba): don gyi mchog 'thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos thob par gyur cig /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis rang gi sug pa nas dbul gyis slar stsol cig /nye dgas smras pa/ kho bos 'di je rung bar
177b7('dul ba): byas/ de'i 'og tu khyim bdag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du gzhug go/ /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dkar po bsngags so/ /nye dgas smras pa/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du
177b8('dul ba): chug shig ces smras nas langs te song ngo / / //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa/ tha ga pas smras pa/ khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig /des smras pa/ kho mo'i ras yug chen gcig kyang
178a1('dul ba): 'phrog tu bcug nas gla gzhan yang ded dam/ song la khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig /de nye dga'i gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag la gla stsol cig /song la khyim bdag gi chung
178a2('dul ba): ma de nyid la dos shig / 'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang de mchid 'bo zhing 'di skad ces khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig ces mchi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ song shig dang byin par 'gyur ro/ /
178a3('dul ba): tha ga pa de yang de'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig /des smras pa/ kwa'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig /mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyi mgrin par chol
178a4('dul ba): zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad tu bskor bar bya'o/ /tha ga pa de yang nye dga'i thad tu song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang des bdag spyos te/ kwa'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug
178a5('dul ba): na ni 'dug shig mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyis mgrin par chol zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad tu bskor bar bya'o zhes mchi yis 'phags pas bdag la gla stsol cig / nye dgas smras pa/ kye nang rje gal te gang
178a6('dul ba): gis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug pa de'i gla kho bo 'jal bar gyur na kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang tshur shog rtsis byas khyod kyis kho bo las bag phye'i rin dang / zhun mar dang /
178a7('dul ba): hwags la sogs pa ji tsam khyer ba dag khod cig ces rtsis byas pa dang / ji tsam na ches lhag par khyer bar gyur nas/ nye dgas tha ga pa de yud tsam zhig nyi tshan la btags te btang ngo / /tha ga pa de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong
178a8('dul ba): rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ de ltar lhag pa kho na bya'o zhes zer la 'bri ba kho nar byed do zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
178b1('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
178b2('dul ba): rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/ nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/ btsun
178b3('dul ba): pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /
178b4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi
178b5('dul ba): bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa
178b6('dul ba): n ye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par
178b7('dul ba): gyis shig / gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa gos 'di zheng che ba dang / khrun ring ba dang / thar gyis zhag pa dang / thags ran bzang bar legs par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos
178b8('dul ba): gla rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bca' ba tsam 'am bza' rgyu cung zad sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bca' ba tsam 'am/ bza' rgyu cung
179a1('dul ba): zad cig sbyin zhing gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /khyim bdag ces bya ba ni skyes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma
179a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni bud med do/ /nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/ /tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no/ /nye du ma yin pa la
179a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/ /gos 'thag tu bcug pa las shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i
179a4('dul ba): gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/ /de na gal te dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' la'o/ /sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro/ /rnam par
179a5('dul ba): rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas shes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' byung nas so/ /tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o/ /'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig /gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag
179a6('dul ba): gis shes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o/ /zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni rgyar che ba'o/ /khrun ring ba zhes bya ba ni chur ring ba'o/ /thar gyis zhag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jur mdud med pa'o/ /thags ran bzang bar zhes bya ba ni byer zug snyoms pa
179a7('dul ba): dang / shas bzang ba dang / sad sed med par ro/ /bza' ba 'am zhes bya ba ni bza' ba lnga po dag go/ /bca' ba tsam 'am zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dag go/ /bza' rgyu zhes bya ba ni bza' ba'i rgyu'o/ /de la gal te dge slong des shes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu
179a8('dul ba): nye dgas so/ /gos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes
179b1('dul ba): gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du gos bsgrub pa'i phyir khri las ldang bar byed/ gos dag dang / sham thabs gon par byed/ lag pa dang / lhung bzed 'khru bar byed/ bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed/ bca' ba lnga dang
179b2('dul ba): bza' ba lnga dag slong bar byed/ tha ga pa la sbyin par byed cing ji srid tu gos thob par mi byed kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /gos thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /gal te phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu gos 'thag tu bcug gis de khyod kyis blta
179b3('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes sngar bstabs par gyur na ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
179b4('dul ba): mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa chos shes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid tu de gnas ngan
179b5('dul ba): len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid tu de dang lhan cig gnas so/ /gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das
179b6('dul ba): kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko
179b7('dul ba): sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
179b8('dul ba): btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs
180a1('dul ba): gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig / dga' bos thos te/ thos nas kyang nye dga' la smas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
180a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des
180a3('dul ba): chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid tu 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das
180a4('dul ba): kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro
180a5('dul ba): na re shig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis bdag cag dge slong rab tu bshes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod
180a6('dul ba): cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas smras pa/ slob dpon re shig gser gyi snod spangs te sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed dam/ khyod kyi lhan cig gnas
180a7('dul ba): pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa su la yod/ des kho bo mthong bar yang mi 'dod do/ /slob dpon bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun
180a8('dul ba): pa gang dag bka' stsal pa de dag las slob dpon gyis 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jud par byas pa yod dam/ de ni thams cad kyi thams cad tu med do/ /de'i phyir khyod kyi gnas skabs de lta bu der gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos kyi snam sbyar
180b1('dul ba): rnyings nas des ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas bsams pa/ bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te snam sbyar btsem par bya'o snyam nas/ des de khyer te dga' bo'i gan du 'phags pa dang / de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/
180b2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa chos gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ kho bo'i snam sbyar rnyings te kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas bdag song ste mkhan po la zhus la snam sbyar btsem par bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ gal te khyod snam sbyar sar pa gzhan
180b3('dul ba): 'tshem na snam sbyar rnying pa 'di kho bo la byin cig / de bzhin bya'o/ /de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gi snam sbyar rnyings te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas snam sbyar btsem par zhu'o/ /nye dgas smras pa slob dpon 'di ni
180b4('dul ba): de'i dus lags so/ /dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bo nyid la snam sbyar zhig yod pa de kho bos khyod la sbyin no/ /mkhan po mi 'tshal te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di las snam sbyar drubs te bcang bar bgyi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang
180b5('dul ba): ldan pa chos kho bos ko gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/ kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi/ kho bos khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcog par mi shes so/ /
180b6('dul ba): ci khyod mkhan po dang mi mthun pa'i don yang dag par len par byed dam/ de dge slong dbang chen pos smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no/ /des de blangs nas smras pa/ mkhan po khyod ras yug
180b7('dul ba): chen 'di bzhes shig / tshe dang ldan pa chos ci kho bos khyod la brje ba'i phyir snam sbyar byin nas ras yug chen yang khyod nyid khyer cig /des bsams pa/ bdag la yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul
180b8('dul ba): bar bya zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po la zhu'o snyam nas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa zhig gis
181a1('dul ba): bslangs pas de la stsal bar bgyi ba mkhan po la zhu'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /des ras yug chen de dge 'dun la phul zhing snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms pa de la byin no/ /phyi de nyin par de snam sbyar de gyon te
181a2('dul ba): mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos shes par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das ko sa la
181a3('dul ba): dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag
181a4('dul ba): 'das te ci nas kyang lto gang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma
181a5('dul ba): dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar 'gyur bas gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro ba na re shig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis/
181a6('dul ba): bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing / rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas
181a7('dul ba): gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad mchis par bka' stsal pa gang dag lags pa de dag mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te bdag ni re shig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs gcig mchi'o/ /dga' bos smras pa/
181a8('dul ba): kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid dang lhan cig mchi'o/ /dga' bos spyos te smras pa/ ngan pa ci kho bos khyod la chos la chos nyid bzang pos snam sbyar byin snyam 'am/ khyod kho bo dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i phyir byin
181b1('dul ba): pa yin na gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gro na snam sbyar 'on cig khyod la mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos kyis bsams pa/ bdag la chos gos phrogs pa ni bla'i bdag gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo
181b2('dul ba): snyam nas des de la snam sbyar phyir byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang
181b3('dul ba): ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs
181b4('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
181b5('dul ba): sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
181b6('dul ba): tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
181b7('dul ba): nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su ba skor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis
181b8('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba/ nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/ thags bzangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs
182a1('dul ba): pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang / spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
182a2('dul ba): bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
182a3('dul ba): pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ nyag gcig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gis bzhugs
182a4('dul ba): pa rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i
182a5('dul ba): dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
182a6('dul ba): yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs
182a7('dul ba): bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang /
182a8('dul ba): chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so/ /
182b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis la las legs par ma bgos pa dang / legs par ma bcangs par ma gyur tam snyam du rnam
182b2('dul ba): par gzigs par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa na tshe dang ldan pa chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs so/ /gzigs
182b3('dul ba): nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub 'am/ bcom ldan 'das grub bo/ /'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang
182b4('dul ba): bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/ /des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong la gos byin nas 'phrog par byed dam/ btsun pa 'phrog par bgyid
182b5('dul ba): do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par
182b6('dul ba): mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la rmas pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong la gos byin nas yang phyir phrogs pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
182b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du
182b8('dul ba): mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan
183a1('dul ba): thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jud cing / de la 'di skad ces dge
183a2('dul ba): slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu dga' bo 'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge slong la zhes bya ba ni
183a3('dul ba): chos 'di pa'o/ /gos shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /byin nas shes bya ba ni phyir sbyin mi
183a4('dul ba): dgos par ro de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/ /khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas shes bya ba ni khro ba ma sangs par ro/ /'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/ /'phrog tu 'jud cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/ /dge slong
183a5('dul ba): des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /lhag ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i lhag ma gang yod pa'o/ /phyir sbyin par bya zhing zhes bya ba ni gtang bar bya zhing ngo / /btang na zhes bya ba ni lus dang bral bar byas na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung
183a6('dul ba): byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ lus g.yo bar byed pa dang / tshig rjod par byed pa dang /
183a7('dul ba): de gnyis ka dang ldan pa dang / gzhan dag gis so/ de la ji ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas she na/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas lus kyis rtul bar byed cing 'dren par
183a8('dul ba): byed khrid par byed la/ tshig gis dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces ni mi zer na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi gra lus la bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur
183b1('dul ba): te/ de ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas so/ /ji ltar tshig rjod par byed pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces tshig rjod par byed la
183b2('dul ba): lus kyis rtul bar mi byed na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyis grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar tshig rjod par byed pas so/ /ji ltar de gnyis ka dang ldan pas she
183b3('dul ba): n a dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas lus kyis kyang rdul bar byed cing tshig gis kyang dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na ji srid
183b4('dul ba): tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de ltar gnyis ka dang ldan pas so/ /ji ltar gzhan
183b5('dul ba): d ag gis she na dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re
183b6('dul ba): rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na gnyis la spang ba'i ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrog
183b7('dul ba): tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong
183b8('dul ba): g is dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slob ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la gos
184a1('dul ba): kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slob ma la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge tshul
184a2('dul ba): 'phrog tu 'jud na/ ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/ /gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge tshul la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur la/ /dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'jud na ji sid du
184a3('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge tshul ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyis grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer
184a4('dul ba): 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge tshul ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid
184a5('dul ba): ma rangs nas khyim pa 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar
184a6('dul ba): byed na khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas khyim pa mo 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du
184a7('dul ba): gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye
184a8('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar gzhan dag gis so/ /don gzhan dang 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis ni ltung ba med do/ /ji ltar don gzhan gyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang
184b1('dul ba): nye gnas dag 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su dus ma yin pa dang / chu klung gi kha 'am/ yur po che'i khar 'gro ba de dag la slob dpon dang / mkhan pos chos rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis gos dag phrogs par gyur na mi
184b2('dul ba): rung ngo snyam pas 'phrog gam/ 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/ de ltar don gzhan gyis so/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i
184b3('dul ba): zla bo dang / sdig pa'i sten grogs dag dang lhan cig sdig pa sten cing lam du 'gro bar gyur na de dag la mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyis 'di dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i zla bo dang / sdig pa'i sten grogs la sten par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam
184b4('dul ba): pas gos dag 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/ de ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis so/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'phrog pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas
