189a5('dul ba): ldan pa'i mdo' sde'i mtha' dag kha ton gyis shig ces 'doms par byed cing / de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo' sde'i mtha' dag kha ton du byed par rtsom mo/ /dge slong ma dag de ltar phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i
189a6('dul ba): chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te/ chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin no/ /chos byin la dge bsnyen sa ga zhes bya ba mngon par dad pas des yo byad thams cad kyis de mgron du bos so/ /dus gzhan zhig na dge bsnyen sa ga chos
189a7('dul ba): byin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal tu 'ongs pa dang / chos byin gyis de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag dbyar khang gcig tu gnas par khas blangs pas de dag phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas
189a8('dul ba): dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin du gyur na khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi phyir dbyar khang byed du 'jud nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis na sa gzhi
189b1('dul ba): rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad tu rgyal po la gsol ba mdzod cig dang der bdag gis dbyar khang bgyid tu stsal to/ /dge slong ma chos byin btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i gan du song ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/ 'phags ma byon pa legs so/ /
189b2('dul ba): byon pa legs so/ /'phags ma sku don ci zhig gi slad tu byon/ bdag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid tu stsol bar 'tshal na sa gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba bgyi bar 'tshal lo/ /'phags
189b3('dul ba): ma khyod bzhud cig dang / bdag gis 'phags ma'i slad du lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/ /chos byin song ba dang btsun mo phreng ldan ma ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song ste des smras pa/ lha khyod kyi pho brang du 'phags ma
189b4('dul ba): chos byin byon par gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de ci'i slad tu byon/ de dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid tu stsol bar bzhed nas/ dog sa rgyal po mnga' bas dog sa'i slad tu rgyal po la gsol ba bgyid ces
189b5('dul ba): mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin re shig gnas 'di nyid tu bzhed na yang de 'di nyid tu bzhugs la rag ste/ nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ /gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa de dbyar khang bgyid tu stsol la rag go/ /
189b6('dul ba): btsun mo phreng ldan mas chos byin la lhas 'phags ma la dam pa gsol te/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin gnas 'di nyid tu bzhed na yang de 'di nyid tu bzhugs la rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ /gal te mi bzhed na gang du
189b7('dul ba): dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo / /chos sbyin gyis dge bsnyen sa ga la ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag la dam pa byin te/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin re shig gnas 'di
189b8('dul ba): nyid tu bzhugs rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ /gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid tu stsol la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo / /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang /
190a1('dul ba): rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod pa las/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom dmag gi gnas su song ba dang / de dag gi chung ma rnams skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pas phyogs de go skabs
190a2('dul ba): dben par gyur nas chos byin gyis smras pa/ phyogs 'dir dbyar khang byed tu chug shig /dge bsnyen sa gas phyogs der dbyar khang byed tu bcug nas dge slong ma rnams kyis der gnas par brtsams so/ /ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dmag gi
190a3('dul ba): gnas nas phyir 'ongs te/ de dag gis chung ma de dag bkug cing bkug cing brdeg par brtsams pa dang / srang dag na de dag ngu ba'i sgra rta'i skad dang / glang po che'i skad lta bu'i skad mthon po dang / skad chen po dag byung ngo / /dge slong ma rnams kyis
190a4('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag dgung char gyis 'jigs pa sa dang la kha'i 'og tu zhugs so/ /chos byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di dag las kha cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba yod dam snyam du bsams na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag lus
190a5('dul ba): snyam du bsams na bdag nyid la rag lus par mthong nas des smras pa/ nu mo dag gdul ba la ltos pas thams cad bzod par bya'o/ /chos byin gyis phyogs gcig tu gyo mo sar pa bzhag ste dge slong ma rnams la smras pa/ nu mo dag
190a6('dul ba): khyed cag gang la sder lhag yod pa de thams cad gyo mo 'dir chug shig / de dag la sder lhag ci yod pa de thams cad gyo mo der 'jud par byed do/ /de na byis pa dag der 'ong bar gyur nas chos byin gyis de na khye'u gang dag yin pa de dag la ni 'bru mar
190a7('dul ba): byin nas gcig gis gcig gi mgo skud tu bcug ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bdag nyid kyis 'bru mar gyis mgo bskus nas rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /byis pa de dag gis
190a8('dul ba): de dag khyer te rang rang gi khyim dag tu dong ba dang de dag gi ma dag gis dris pa/ khyed cag la 'di dag sus byin/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags ma chos byin gyis so/ /chung ma de dag gis bsams pa/ don gyis na 'phags ma chos byin ni
190b1('dul ba): bdag cag la ma ma'i bya ba mdzad do snyam du rig nas de mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dag gis bsams pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'dong ba de'i tshe na bdag cag gis khyim thab dag bskyal nas 'phags ma
190b2('dul ba): chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/ /dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'phags pa dang / chos byin gyis de dag 'dul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/
190b3('dul ba): lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang / chu dang dri dang / gdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang / chung ma de dag kyang khyim thab dag bskyal te chos byin gyi drung
190b4('dul ba): du lhags nas chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang / lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por dag byin nas tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun
190b5('dul ba): gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud
190b6('dul ba): nas ji nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas
190b7('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i shes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma
190b8('dul ba): bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis
191a1('dul ba): te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams
191a2('dul ba): kyi nang du ni bzhag / 'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/ 'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon
191a3('dul ba): par zhugs pa lags so/ /'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ 'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/
191a4('dul ba): deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas khyim khyim du dong ste chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te spyod lam zhi bas 'khod do/ /
191a5('dul ba): de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas nas phyir 'ong ba na bsams pa/ bdag cag gi chung ma glang po che 'tsho ba 'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ su zhig dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed cing 'dug snyam mo/ /de dag gis bdag cag gi
191a6('dul ba): khyim thab dag 'ongs shes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bshes pa dang bcas pa'i tshig gis rje'i sras dag byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so zhes bsu nas de dag rang rang gi khyim du dong ba dang / de dag rang rang gi chung ma dag gis
191a7('dul ba): bsku mnye dang dril phyi byas te khrus byas nas legs par bskus te zas byin no/ /de dag gis bsams pa/ 'di dag gi spyod lam 'di lta bu ni sngon ma byung ngo snyam nas de dag la dris pa/ bzang mo dag khyed kyi spyod lam 'di lta bu 'di sngon
191a8('dul ba): ma byung ba yin na ji las gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ rje'i sras dag 'phags ma chos byin gyis bdag cag la ji nas kyang bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba rnams la slan chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu kun du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos
191b1('dul ba): bstan pa mdzad do/ /de dag gis bsams pa/ 'phags ma chos byin ni ma dul ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin te/ des 'di dag btul ba lta ste/ gang gi phyir bdag cag gis 'di dag bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / spyo bas gdul bar ma
191b2('dul ba): nus pa dag 'phags ma chos byin gyis chos bstan pas btul bas 'phags ma chos byin gyis bdag cag la phan btags kyis/ bdag cag gis kyang rgyal po bltas te 'phags ma chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/ /chos byin
191b3('dul ba): gyis kyang de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang / chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan
191b4('dul ba): pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang / de dag kyang rgyal po bltas nas chos byin gyi drung du lhags pa dang / chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang / lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por dag byin nas tshigs su bcad
191b5('dul ba): pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
191b6('dul ba): khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong
191b7('dul ba): nas smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang
191b8('dul ba): ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / 'dza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag
192a1('dul ba): las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag /'khor ba ni mthar
192a2('dul ba): bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/ 'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /
192a3('dul ba): 'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ 'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i
192a4('dul ba): bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas yang smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag gis da ni srog chags grog sbur la yang bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi thog la/ bdag cag ni
192a5('dul ba): mtshon chas 'tsho ba lags na bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos byin gyis smras pa/ gzhu gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang / mda' mde'u med pa dag dang / shing gi ral gri dag thogs shig /de dag gzhu gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang /
192a6('dul ba): mda' mde'u med pa dag dang / shing gi ral gri dag thogs so/ /gang gi tshe de dag gis bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na phyin chad brgyan pos rtse bar mi byed/ chang 'thung bar mi byed/ bud med gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par
192a7('dul ba): mi byed pas de dag longs spyod dag gis phyugs pa dang nye bar bsags par gyur te/ /de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang yongs su ma spyad pas tsho ba dang / lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur to/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal
192a8('dul ba): po gsal rgyal gyi ri brags pa zhig log nas der dmag ru gcig btang na bcom pa dang / rab tu bcom pa dang / so sor bcom par gyur te phyir 'ongs so/ /de bzhin du ru gnyis pa btang na de yang bcom pa dang / rab tu bcom pa dang / so sor bcom
192b1('dul ba): par gyur te phyir 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha ri brags pa'i dpung ni skyes shing lha'i dpung ni nyams te gal te lha nyid der ma gshegs na ri brags pa bsgrub dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa
192b2('dul ba): byas te nga'i yul na mtshon chas 'tsho ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad der 'gro bar bya'o zhes bsgo nas/ rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bkon te chas so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu
192b3('dul ba): can dang / rgyal rigs bzang po pa bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod pa las ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni mdun du 'gro ba'i mi yin la/ rgyal rigs bzang po'i khrom ni phyi nas 'ong ba'i mi yin pas rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom mdun
192b4('dul ba): du song ba'i mi dag tsho zhing lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang tsho zhing lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag
192b5('dul ba): khrom 'di gang gi yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i khrom ral gri'i mthu can zhes bgyi ba mdun du mchi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos rgyab tu bltas pa dang ji tsam rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom gyi mi dag rid pa dang / nyam
192b6('dul ba): chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob pa dang / de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ /
192b7('dul ba): shes ldan dag 'di gang gi khrom yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i khrom rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bgyi ba slad bzhin mchi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci 'di dag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/ de
192b8('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/ lha dbang thang mnyam par stsol to/ /de dag bos shig /de dag bos pa dang rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/ lha mnyam par stsol to/ /'o na ci'i phyir ral
193a1('dul ba): gri'i mthu can gyi khrom 'di dag ni 'byor pa dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur la/ rgyal rigs bzang po'i khrom khyed ni rgud pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob par gyur/ lha gal
193a2('dul ba): te bdag cag kyang gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang / mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang / zhugs shing gi ral gri dag thogs shing mtshon cha dag btsongs shing btsongs shing 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ bdag cag kyang 'byor pa dang /
193a3('dul ba): lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'di dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag ni yongs su ma spyad la/ bdag cag gi rta dang / glang po che dag ni yongs su spyad do/ /rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ /shes ldan
193a4('dul ba): dag khyed de ltar gyur pa bden nam/ lha mad do/ /ci khyed cag da der khrid la ri brags su gsad par 'dod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha ci lags mtshon chas g.yul sprod dam/ mis g.yul sprod/ /rgyal pos spyos te smras pa/ /
193a5('dul ba): gal te mtshon chas g.yul mi sprod na khyed cag nyid deng la ri brags pa de phob shig ces smras te rgyal po de nyid nas phyir log go/ /ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag chos byin gyi gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag rgyal
193a6('dul ba): pos dmag gi gnas su bskos na bdag cag gis ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ chos byin gyis smras pa/ deng shig dang / khyed cag der dong ba rnams la nyes dmigs 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gang dang gang du 'brang
193a7('dul ba): 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa lhogs shig / nyi ma gang la ri brags skor bar byed pa'i nyi ma de la mtshan thams cad du chos mnyan pa byin la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten
193a8('dul ba): skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa gyis shig /de dag gis 'phags
193b1('dul ba): ma chos byin gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba byas te/ 'phags nas de dag gang dang gang du 'brang 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa klog par byed cing / gang gi nyin mo ri brags skor bar byed pa de'i nyin mo mtshan thams cad du
193b2('dul ba): chos mnyan pa byin nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
193b3('dul ba): nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa byas pa dang / de'i tshe na rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin rnams gnod sbyin 'du bar 'phags pa dang / des yon bshad pa byed pa de thos nas des bsams pa/ bdag gi ming gis yon bshad pa byed pa
193b4('dul ba): 'di su zhig snyam nas ji tsam na chos kyi spun dag gnas ma yin par bskos pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen la smras pa/ nga'i chos kyi spun 'di dag gnas ma yin par bskos kyis song la
193b5('dul ba): ri brags de phob ste 'di dag la byin la srog chags 'ga' la yang mi gnod par gyis shig / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas/ ri'i rtse mo lta bu'i glang po che dag dang / rnga mo
193b6('dul ba): lta bu'i rta dag dang / gzhal med khang lta bu'i shing rta dag dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa lta bu'i mi dag mngon par sprul nas ri brag pa dag gis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /de dag gis de dag mthong nas skrag ste bsams pa/ /
193b7('dul ba): yul dang srog la gnod gyur na/ /skyes bus kun du srog bsrung bya/ /blo yis gnyis ka dpyad byas na/ /yul ni yang rnyed srog rnams min/ /snyam nas de dag gis ral gri mgul du btags te ri brag nas byung ba dang / de dag gis de dag
193b8('dul ba): bzung nas sgyu dpya dang bcas te mnyan yod tu bdas nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du dong ste smras pa/ lha ri brag pa ni 'di lags/ sgyu dpya ni 'di dag lags so/ /rgyal po dga' nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sgyu dpya
194a1('dul ba): dag khyed cag nyid khyer cig / de dag gis bsams pa/ bdag cag gson zhing lhags pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'phags ma chos byin gyi mthu yin pas bdag cag dong la sgyu dpya 'di dag 'phags ma chos byin la dbul lo
194a2('dul ba): snyam nas de dag gis de dag khyer te chos byin gyi gan du dong nas smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag son zhing lhags pa dang / bdag cag gi dpal dang skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'phags ma kho na'i
194a3('dul ba): mthu lags kyis/ rgyal pos bdag cag la sgyu dpya stsal ba 'di dag 'phags mas thugs brtse ba'i slad tu bzhes su gsol/ des smras pa/ bu dag lha rnams kyi nang du yang lha dbul ba yod kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
194a4('dul ba): 'dun la mchod pa gyis shig dang / des khyed cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs nas de dag
194a5('dul ba): snga dro ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dag byed/ phyi dro ni chos nyan par byed do// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa drug pa/ dus gzhan zhig na ko sa lar
194a6('dul ba): byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ri brag pa gzhan zhig log nas rgyal pos rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom la bsgo ba/ deng la ri brag pa de phob shig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha bdag cag ni rgud pa lags la/
194a7('dul ba): ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni 'byor pa lags na/ 'di'i tshe de dag la bka' stsal cing bdag cag res gzhan la mchi bar ci gnang / rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo ba/ deng la ri brags pa che ge mo zhig phob shig /
194a8('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ lha bdag cag gis res khor lags so/ /deng shig dang res gzhan la mi btang ngo / /de dag gis bsams pa/ de'i tshe ni bdag cag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brags pa de phab
194b1('dul ba): kyi/ da ni bdag gis de nyid du 'chi bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas 'di ltar bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs pa de dag la chos gos dag phul te 'dod par bya'o snyam nas/ de dag chos gos dag thogs
194b2('dul ba): te gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag rgyal pos dmag gi gnas su btang ste/ gal te na bdag cag de nyid tu 'gum par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchi bar 'gyur bas chos gos 'di
194b3('dul ba): dag bzhes su gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to/ /de dag gis smras pa/
194b4('dul ba): 'phags pa dag khyed cag gis bzhes te zhog la dgag dbye bgyis nas bgo bar mdzad cig ces de dag gis de dag gi gnas khang du bcug ste dong ngo / /de dag 'phags pa dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan
194b5('dul ba): dag gar 'dong / khyim bdag dmag gi gnas gnas su mchi'o/ /khyed kyis res ma khor ram/ khyim bdag res khor ro/ /'o na ci'i phyir 'dong / lha'i zhal nas deng shig dang res gzhan du mi btang ngo zhes byung ngo / /kho bos lha la zhus
194b6('dul ba): de'i bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig / de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lhas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom gang du bka' stsal/ khyim bdag ri brags pa che ge mo zhig log nas de 'bebs su'o/ /lha de dag gis res ma khor ram/
194b7('dul ba): khyim bdag res khor ro/ /'o na ji slad tu bka' stsal/ res gzhan du mi btang bar byas so/ /ci lhas gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang / mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang / zhugs shing gi ral gri thogs pa de dag gis ri brags pa
194b8('dul ba): dag mi phebs par mi mkhyen tam/ gzhan yang de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag ste/ de dag gis srog chags grog sbur la yang bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi thog go/ /'di ltar de'i tshe yang de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag
195a1('dul ba): dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brag pa de phab bo/ /'di ltar de dag der mchis su lags na nongs dmigs 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des lha la yang ma legs par 'gyur gor ma bkum mo/ /khyim bdag ji de
195a2('dul ba): dag sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag yin nam/ lha de lags te de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma chos byin la brten nas thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal
195a3('dul ba): po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng phyin chad khyed kyis dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo bar bya'i/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo bar mi bya'o de nas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag phyir
195a4('dul ba): mkhos su phab nas dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i tshe dge slong de dag de dag gi gan du dong ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag kho bo cag dgag dbye byas kyis chos gos dag byin cig /'phags pa dag bdag cag gis chos
195a5('dul ba): gos dag phul lags kyis de dag bzhes shig / dge slong de dag dong ste gnas khang sgo phye ba dang / phyogs des snum zhing mngar bas chos gos de dag sril dag gis rmugs te rdul du brlags te 'dug par snang ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams
195a6('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gos sbed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar
195a7('dul ba): bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gos kyi rnyed pa sbas pa dang ma sbas pa mi shes pa'o/ /gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa
195a8('dul ba): yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gos sbas pa dang ma sbas pa shes pa'o/ /'di ltar
195b1('dul ba): bsko bar bya ste/ ji dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa sbed par spro 'am/ gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas te/ gan Di brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong
195b2('dul ba): rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos
195b3('dul ba): kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming
195b4('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko ste/ dge
195b5('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi
195b6('dul ba): bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
195b7('dul ba): to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang / bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang / phri ba rnams dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / mdzes pa rnams dang /
195b8('dul ba): drod rig pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin pa 'di ni gnang ba yin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par
196a1('dul ba): bya ste/ dge slong gis ston zla tha chung nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/ /blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o/ /de las 'das
196a2('dul ba): par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/ /ston zla tha chungs nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun cad tu zhes bya ba ni zhag bcu na dgag dbye 'byung ba tshun chad tu'o/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig
196a3('dul ba): ces bya ba ni brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad pa la sbyin pa dang / nad pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang / 'chi ba la sbyin pa dang / shi ba'i phyir sbyin pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa'o/ /rnyed pa la zhes bya ba ni
196a4('dul ba): gzhan las so/ /'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /dge slong des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /gos de zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i
196a5('dul ba): gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o/ /blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sba bar bya'o/ /
196a6('dul ba): dge slong gi gos sbyin pa'i dus ni gang yin/ dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na/ sra brkyang ma bting ba'i gnas ni ston zla tha chung nya tshun chad ni gos sbyin pa'i dus ma yin la/ lhag ma ni dus yin no/ /sra brkyang bting ba'i
196a7('dul ba): gnas na ni ston zla tha chung nya phan chad nas dpyid zla 'bring po nya tshun chad ni dus ma yin la/ lhag ma ni dus yin no/ /de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de
196a8('dul ba): spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bdag gir byed dam/ gos
196b1('dul ba): sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par 'chang na thams cad tu spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag bdag gir byed pa dang / sbyin bdag gis rang gi lag nas sbyin par byed na ltung ba med do/ /gos sbed pa'i
196b2('dul ba): dge slong bskos pa dang / sbyin bdag 'ongs te 'phags pa dag bzhes shig dang / gos 'di bdag mchis nas rang gi sug pa nyid nas dbul lo zhes zer ba la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang
196b3('dul ba): tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
196b4('dul ba): ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod nas ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag shig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste de yang dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas des dge 'dun la bsngos
196b5('dul ba): te gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang / skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go/ /gtsug lag khang der dge slong
196b6('dul ba): drug bcus dbyar dgag dbye dag byas te dong nas khyim bdag des der ma byin par len pa dag gis khri 'am khri'u dag ma brkus par gyis shig ces srungs ma'i mi bzhag go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan
196b7('dul ba): drug bcu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brag der phyin nas/ bsti gnas rnyed par byed pa na mi zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad tu gtsug lag khang du mi gnas/ bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ga la
196b8('dul ba): yod/ 'phags pa dag dgon pa 'di na'o/ /dge slong de dag der dong ba dang / srungs ma'i mis mthong nas/ des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen bkur byas te gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshang
197a1('dul ba): can dang / la ba la sogs pa dag phul te/ spyangs tshags g.yar nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag re shig chab btsag par mdzod cig dang de'i bar du bdag gis khyim bdag la brjod par bgyi'o zhes mi de khyim bdag gi drung du song
197a2('dul ba): ste smras pa / khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig /khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du dge slong blo bur du lhags pa drug bcu mchis so/ /khyim bdag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas nang mi dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge
197a3('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun byon pa dag legs par sbyar ba'i btung bas tshim par byas/ bu ram dang / hwags dang / li kha ra dang / rgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u long shig ces khyim bdag des legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sbyar nas gtsug lag
197a4('dul ba): khang du song ba dang / dge slong dag kyang chu btsags te rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod do/ /khyim bdag des dge slong de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/ des gtsug lag khang de mtsho pad mas gang ba bzhin du mthong nas/ rgya cher dad
197a5('dul ba): pa'i shugs kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyud kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ grong ngam yang na dgon pa'ang rung / /gshong ngam yang na thang yang rung / /gang na 'os pa gnas pa yi/ /sa gzhi de na dga' byed yin/ /de nas legs par sbyar
197a6('dul ba): ba'i btung ba sta gon byas te/ rang gi lag nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag tshim par byas nas rang nyid kyis pog por thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs te
197a7('dul ba): rgan pa'i mtha'i logs su 'dug go dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad nas khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ sang bdag gi sdum par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang
197a8('dul ba): zhes smras pa dge slong rnams kyis kyang dang du blangs nas/ khyim bdag de rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /khyim bdag des phyi de nyin par zas bsod pas dge slong dag tshim par byas shing dus ma yin par yang btung ba
197b1('dul ba): blud nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan to/ /phyis kyang de kho na bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa dang / khyim bdag de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis gtsug lag khang
197b2('dul ba): 'di bdag nyid kyi slad tu yang bgyid du ma stsal/ nye du rnams kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal gyi/ 'di ltar 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du stsal pa lags kyis/ 'di nyid tu dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes shig dang / bdag gis 'phags
197b3('dul ba): pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag mnyan yod na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing / dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
197b4('dul ba): sum du byas/ che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar grub bo zhes shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang thos par 'gyur/ rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin tu dad/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /
197b5('dul ba): rnying pa dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang / ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma dang / gzhan yang dad pa can mang du yod pas der zang zing gi longs sbyod dang / chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang 'grub pas bdag cag de nyid tu 'dong ngo / /'phags pa dag chos kyi
197b6('dul ba): longs spyod ni 'phags pa dag nyid la rag las pa lags kyi/ zang zing gi longs spyod ni bdag la rag las pa lags pas dgyes pa bskyed cig dang cung zad kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag
197b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa can gyi dad pa spel bar bya zhing sbyin bdag la rjes su snying brtse bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ 'di nyid tu 'khod par bya'o zhes de dag der 'khod nas/ blo brtan pas gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas par so sor
197b8('dul ba): brtag par brtsams pa dang / gtsug lag khang de me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ shin tu dga' bar mthong nas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di me tog phun
198a1('dul ba): sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ shin tu dga' ba yin pas gal te bdag cag gis 'dir dbyar snga mar gnas par khas blangs na me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad yongs su longs spyod par mi 'gyur gyis/ bdag
198a2('dul ba): cag gis nges par dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o zhes de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/ /khyim bdag de la gtsug lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams
198a3('dul ba): cad gtsug lag khang de nyid tu sbyin zhing byed do/ /ri brag de na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brag pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid tu sbyin par byed do/ /ri brag de'i nyen kor na yang
198a4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags kyi nyen kor pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas der dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo / /
198a5('dul ba): ston zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dgag dbye byas ma thag tu 'dus te bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do/ /de dag 'di snyam
198a6('dul ba): du sems te/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong 'di dag gzhom par bya'o snyam mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de dag ni sgo 'phar brgya snyed bzla ba byas kyang lto khengs pa 'grub par dka' bas/ de dag la ci yang med na bdag cag ci'i phyir yun de srid du bsdad par bya/
198a7('dul ba): de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa cig 'dug pas smras pa/ khyod ci shes de dag la mang du yod do/ /ji ltar re shig gtsug lag khang 'di gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag de ni dad pa can bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can yin la/ khyim bdag de la yang gtsug lag
198a8('dul ba): khang de gcig pu 'ba' shig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/ /ri brags 'di na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med bas ri brags pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems
198b1('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/ /ri brags 'di'i nye 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags kyi nye 'khor ba 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid
198b2('dul ba): du sbyin zhing byed pas 'dir dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo / /gal te yid mi ches na song la ltos shig dang rang nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na khyod nyid je song la mngon sum du gyis shig dang
198b3('dul ba): kho bo cag phyis 'ong ngo / /de smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig dang / kho bo 'gro'o zhes de gos tshags bcos te 'phags shing / de nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang der zhugs so/ /
198b4('dul ba): ji tsam na sgo khang na rgan zhugs shig 'dug nas g.yon can des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dri bar brtsams pa/ 'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/ bzhin bzangs khyim bdag
198b5('dul ba): che ge mo zhig gi yin no/ /'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu yin/ phongs pa ni ji lta bu yin/ 'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang
198b6('dul ba): lags so/ /gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzangs 'o na 'di ni gtsug lag khang yin gyi phongs pa ma yin te 'di na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yod kyi/ 'di na yo byad med pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa zas za ba ni 'ga'
198b7('dul ba): yang sa rdul mi za la/ gos dag gyon pa ni 'ga' yang shing shun dag mi gyon pas khyed cag la gos cung zad ma mchis sam/ rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas des g.yon can de'i lag nas bzung ste gnas khang
198b8('dul ba): du bcug nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs gos kyi gdang gos dag gis phur shog cing 'dug pa la ltos/ 'phags pa ci 'di khyod kyi lags
199a1('dul ba): sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi lags/ bzhin bzangs 'di kho bo gang zag gi yin no/ /'phags pa 'o na khyod ni gor ma bkum par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam/ chos sgrog pa zhig lags so/ /bzhin bzangs kho bo ni
199a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yang ma yin la/ chos sgrog pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gsar bu dge tshul zhig yin no/ /'phags pa de ni mjal na 'di na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal cung zad ma mchis sam/ bzhin bzangs mang
199a3('dul ba): du yod de re shig kho bo'i byug ris su yang dngos po bdun po dag 'thob bo/ /'phags pa de yang mjal gyis 'di zhu'o/ /gtsug lag khang 'di na gang la la 'tshal ma bgyid pa de ji rdza mkhan gyi snod du 'tshed dam/ 'on te zangs ma'i snod tu 'tshed
199a4('dul ba): bzhin bzangs khyod kyis gnas khang 'di dag mthong ngam/ 'phags pa mthong ngo / /bzhin bzangs gnas khang 'di dag zangs ma'i snod kyis gang zhing 'dug go/ /g.yon can des bsams pa/ legs par brid zin gyis da ni 'gro'o snyam nas g.yon
199a5('dul ba): can des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams pa ni bdag gi don yongs su nyams pa lags pas bdag slad kyis kyang mchi yis da ni mchi'o/ /bzhin bzangs de bzhin gyis shig /g.yon can des rgan zhugs de'i
199a6('dul ba): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas g.yon can de chom rkun pa de dag gi drung du song ste smras pa/ pad ma'i mig can dag rdzas thams cad kyis gang ba'i gru bo che skam sa na 'dug gis phrogs shig /phrogs shig /de na gcig gis smras
199a7('dul ba): pa/ de na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug bcu po dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon sha stag yin zhes grags pas de bzhin du gzhom par mi nus kyis/ gang gi tshe de dag mtshan mo chos nyan pa de'i tshe gzhom mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa nyi ma
199a8('dul ba): gang la de dag gi chos nyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ des smras pa/ tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi la 'byung ste/ de la tshes brgyad ni thal zin pas tshes bcu bzhi la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag sor mo dag gis nyi ma bgrang zhing 'khod 'khod nas/ ji tsam na
199b1('dul ba): tshes bcu bzhi la bab ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo bton te/ dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong byas nas chos sgrog pa seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te 'di skad ces/ mi mchog gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur mdzad pa/ /kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod pa de bzhin
199b2('dul ba): gshegs/ /dbang po zhi zhing nyer zhi zhi la mkhas/ /mnyan yod zhugs pas bka' bzhin byed la gsungs/ /zhes bya bar brtsams pa dang / g.yon can de dag gis sgo brdungs so/ /dge slong dag gis tshor nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag su yin/
199b3('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go/ /dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ ri brags nas skye bo'i tshogs dag chos nyan du lhags gor ma chag gis sgo dbye'o snyam nas/ de dag gis sgo phye ba dang de dag zhugs so/ /ji tsam na gzhom
199b4('dul ba): par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag na re bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go zhes zer na/ da nged cag 'joms par byed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag la ming gnyis mchis te/ slad rol tu ni
199b5('dul ba): rigs kyi bu dag ces bgyi la/ nang du ni chom rkun pa dag ces bgyi'o/ /khyed cag gi ming 'dogs par byed pa ni nyams so/ /g.yon can de dag gis dge slong de dag bcom ste dong nas dge slong bcom pa de dag gis gros byas pa/ tshe dang ldan
199b6('dul ba): pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzho bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ re shig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/ bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/
199b7('dul ba): bdag cag mnyan yod nyid tu dong na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gros byas so/ /ji ltar 'dong bar bya/ mtshan mo 'gebs pas 'dong zhing nyin mo thibs
199b8('dul ba): por zhugs te 'gro bar bya'o zhes de dag gis khyim bdag la yang ma bltas par dong ngo / /ji tsam na mthar gyis mnyan yod tu phyin pa dang dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag
200a1('dul ba): gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i gam yo na rgyu ba mthong nas smras pa/ gcer bu sgre byi dag khyed cag 'dir ci 'dod 'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang yang ma yin la/ 'dug gnas kyang ma yin no/ /de dag gis
200a2('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gcer bu dag ma yin no/ /'o na khyed su yin/ dge slong dag go/ /'di lta bu dag dge slong yin nam/ gang dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa de dag ji lta bu yin/ khyed cag ming ci/
200a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'tsho'o/ /chos 'tsho'o/ /dge 'dun 'tsho'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so zhes de dag gis sgo phye nas dge slong de dag 'jug tu bcug ste/ de dag la la las ni chos gos byin/ la las ni sham thabs
200a4('dul ba): byin/ la las ni rngul zan byin/ la las ni lhung bzed byin/ la las ni chu tshags byin te/ bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du thams cad bgo bsha' byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
200a5('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag dgon pa pas chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos
200a6('dul ba): gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag de nyid tu dong ste nyal bar byed pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad tu 'dir
200a7('dul ba): gzims par mdzad/ kho bo cag gis chos gos dag 'dir gzhag go/ /'phags pa dag ci khyod kyi chos gos dag rku bar bgyid dam/ gal te thugs mi ches na snoms te bzhud cig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
200a8('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der nyal bar mi bya'o/ /de dag phyir dong ste skya reng 'char bar byed pa dang / bud med kyi yul sgren mor nyal ba de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad tu mtshan
200b1('dul ba): mo nyid la 'dir byon/ kho bo cag gis 'dir chos gos dag bzhag go/ /'phags pa dag ci khyed cag gi chos gos dag rku bar bgyid dam/ gal te thugs mi ches na snoms te bzhud cig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
200b2('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der skya reng 'char bar mi bya'o/ de dag phyis der dong ste bang rim du skya reng 'char bar byed pa dang / de dag chom rkun pa dag dang / g.yon can dag dang / seng ge dag dang / stag dang / gung dag gi dbang du
200b3('dul ba): gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang du skya reng 'char bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams la dge 'dun gyi dang / mchod rten gyi dang / gang zag gi bya ba'i phyir
200b4('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro dgos par gyur pa de dag bdag cag gis khyim gzhan du chos gos dag gzhag go zhes der mi 'gro ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
200b5('dul ba): dge slong dgon pa pas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad tu chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar bya'o/ /dge slong drug sde dag bsams bzhin du zhag bdun du 'bral bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
200b6('dul ba): 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
200b7('dul ba): mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag ngas dge slong dgon pa pas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du
200b8('dul ba): chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ khyed cag bsams bzhin du zhag bdun du mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma
201a1('dul ba): yin pa rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/ dge slong rnams la bka'
201a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon
201a3('dul ba): par bya ste/ dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas mal dgon pa dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/ 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa/ 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu dbyar phyi mar gyur la/ dge slong
201a4('dul ba): dgon pa pas 'dod na chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong dgon pa pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na dge slong dgon pa pa des zhag drug gi mtha'
201a5('dul ba): tshun chad tu chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o/ /de las 'das par 'bral na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/ /rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni gnyis yan chad rab tu mang po dag yin no/ /
201a6('dul ba): gnas mal zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang ngo / /dgon pa zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab drug la rdul phra mo gcig go/ /rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig go/ /chu rdul drug la lcags rdul gcig go/ /lcags rdul drug la ri bong rdul gcig
201a7('dul ba): go/ /ri bong rdul drug la lug rdul gcig go/ /lug rdul drug pa glang rdul gcig go/ /glang rdul drug la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/ /nyi zer gyi rdul drug la sro ma gcig go/ /sro ma drug la shig gcig go/ /shig drug la nas gcig go/ /
201a8('dul ba): nas drug la sor gcig go/ /sor bzhi drug la khru gang ngo / /khru phyed dang bzhi la mi'i srid do/ /khru bzhi la gzhu'o/ /gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags te de phan cad dgon pa'o/ /dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can gyis
201b1('dul ba): 'jigs par grags pa'o/ /'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang / stag dang / gung gis 'jigs par grags pa'o/ /'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu zhes bya ba ni sha sbrang dang /
201b2('dul ba): sbrang bu mchu rings dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu'o/ /dbyar phyi mar gyur la zhes bya ba ni dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs par gyur la'o/ /dge slong dgon pa pas
201b3('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang / mthang gos las gang 'dod pa'o/ /khyim gzhan du zhes bya ba ni
201b4('dul ba): gang na lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag yod par ro/ /gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gtams par bya ba'o/ /dge slong dgon pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na zhes bya ba ni dge
201b5('dul ba): 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'am/ gang zag gi bya ba'i phyir mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na'o/ /dge slong dgon pa pa des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /zhag drug gi mtha' tshun cad tu
201b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan drug gi mtha' tshun cad tu'o/ /chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos gos bzhag pa gang yin pa de dang ngo / /de las 'das par 'bral na zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par skya
201b7('dul ba): reng 'char bar byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar dge slong
201b8('dul ba): dgon pa pas chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du bral na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /'di 'am der bar chad brgyad po 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom
202a1('dul ba): rkun pa'i 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang / stag gi 'jigs pa dang / mi'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa las gang yang rung ba nye bar gnas pa la ltung ba
202a2('dul ba): med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /zhag bdun gyis 'bral ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
202a3('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de na dge slong gang dag snga mas dbyar gnas pa
202a4('dul ba): khas len pa de dag ni rang gi dus yin no/ /zhes tshol bar byed cing bdag cag gis ci'i phyir mi bcang zhes 'chang bar byed do/ /phyi mas dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag kyang rang gi dus yin no zhes 'chang bar byed cing bdag
202a5('dul ba): cag gis ci'i phyir mi btsal zhes tshol bar byed de/ de dag ha cang myur bar tshol ba dang / ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pas bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bar gyur te/ lung mnod pa dang / kha ton dang /
202a6('dul ba): rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas/ dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na ci'i
202a7('dul ba): phyir de dag ha cang myur du tshol bar byed cing ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pas bya ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur te/ lung mnod pa dang / kha ton dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar
202a8('dul ba): byed ces smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang /
202b1('dul ba): skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/
202b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/ dge slong dag khyed ngas dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ khyed cag ha cang myur du tshol ba dang / ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar
202b3('dul ba): byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso dka' ba dang / dgang dka' ba dang / 'dod pa che ba dang / chog mi shes pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sla ba dang / dgang sla
202b4('dul ba): ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / phri ba dang / /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / mdzes pa dang / drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon
202b5('dul ba): bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/
202b6('dul ba): dge slong gis so ka rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na dbyar gyi gos ras chen btsal bar bya'o/ /dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o/ /gal te dge slong gis so ka rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i
202b7('dul ba): sngon rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam/ dbyar zad nas 'og du zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/ /so ka rnams kyi zla ba gcig
202b8('dul ba): lus na zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig na dbyar nye bar sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba na'o/ /dbyar gyi gos ras chen zhes bya ba ni char pa bab pa'i gos so/ /btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/ /dbyar zad nas 'og tu
203a1('dul ba): zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye byas nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du'o/ /gal te dge slong gis so ka rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam zhes bya ba ni de'i mdun
203a2('dul ba): rol du'o/ /dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spang nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes
203a3('dul ba): gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ snga ma dang / phyi ma las te/ de la gang dag dbyar snga mar gnas par khas len pa de dag la ni ha cang yang yun ring du 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag dbyar phyi mar gnas par
203a4('dul ba): khas len pa de dag la ha cang myur du tshol na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na dge slong gis ji tsam du ha cang myur du tshol bar byed pa dang / ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang /
203a5('dul ba): smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /dbyar gyi ras chen gyi spang ba ste nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal wa tshongs
203a6('dul ba): can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis rang gi dad pa dang / rang gi gcugs pa dang / rang gi dang bas gtsug lag khang byed tu bcug nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la gang zag gir phul lo/ /de nas
203a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gtsug lag khang der ji tsam pa de tsam 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song ngo / /khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra gcan zin gtsug lag khang der ji tsam pa de tsam 'dug nas lhung bzed
203a8('dul ba): dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song zhes thos so thos nas kyang khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin ci dgar ljongs su 'dug nas shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal wa tshongs can ga la
203b1('dul ba): ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhig 'gro ba'i tshe wa tshongs can du phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
203b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'di na khyim bdag cig gis rang
203b3('dul ba): gi dad pa dang rang gi gcugs pa dang / rang gi dang bas gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal nas bdag la gang zag gir stsal te/ bdag gtsug lag khang der ci tsam mchis nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'tshal te ljongs rgyur mchis pa dang khyim
203b4('dul ba): bdag des 'phags pa sgra gcan zin gtsug lag khang der ci tsam pa de tsam mchis nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'tshal te/ ljongs rgyur mchis shes thos nas kyang khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul na/ btsun pa de la bdag
203b5('dul ba): gis da ji ltar bgyi/ sgra gcan zin tshur shog /khyod khyim bdag de ga la ba der song la phyin nas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam/ ngag la cung zad smod par mi byed dam zhes smros shig /tshe dang ldan pa sgra
203b6('dul ba): gcan zin gyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam/ ngag la cung zad smod par
203b7('dul ba): mi byed dam/ 'phags pa sgra gcan zin bdag khyod kyi sku 'am/ gsung la cung zad kyang smod par mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
203b8('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'di na bdag khyim bdag ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas khyim bdag de la 'di skad
204a1('dul ba): ces khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam/ ngag la cung zad smod par mi byed dam zhes bgyis na/ de 'di skad ces 'phags pa sgra gcan zin bdag khyod kyi sku 'am/ gsung la smod pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so zhes mchi'o/ /de'i tshe
204a2('dul ba): na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug par gyur cing bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
204a3('dul ba): dga' bo song la dge slong ji snyed wa tshongs can nye bar rten cing 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong ji snyed wa tshongs
204a4('dul ba): c an nye ba rten cing 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas
204a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa dge slong ji snyed wa tshongs can nye bar rten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing 'thun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis de de'i
204a6('dul ba): dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpong sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
204a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/ longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/ /
204a8('dul ba): gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyod tu rung ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis gnyis la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig
204b1('dul ba): la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin
204b2('dul ba): zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis rab tu mang po la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la
204b3('dul ba): longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis
204b4('dul ba): dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin
204b5('dul ba): par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun bye zhing gnyis su gyur te phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa na phyogs
204b6('dul ba): gcig la sbyin pa byin nas/ phyogs gnyis pa la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin
204b7('dul ba): pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang
204b8('dul ba): ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis gnyis la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /
205a1('dul ba): gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis rab tu mang po la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan
205a2('dul ba): gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing
205a3('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la byin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs
205a4('dul ba): spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /gzhan gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /dge slong dag gang gis
205a5('dul ba): dge 'dun bye zhing gnyis su gyur la phyogs dag gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa na phyogs gcig la sbyin pa byin nas/ phyogs gnyis pa la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len
205a6('dul ba): pa yin la/ longs spyad tu rung ba yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni sbyin pa yin la/ phyi ma ni ma yin no/ /rgyal po ni sa gzhi la dbang la/ bdag po ni gnas mal la dbang / dge slong ni lhung bzed dang chos gos la dbang ngo / /
205a7('dul ba): sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gis rang gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya bar ni rung gi rang gis gzhan la sbyin du ni mi rung ngo / /dge slong dag dge slong sgra gcan zin la gtsug lag khang de phyir byin cig /dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa
205a8('dul ba): sgra gcan zin la gtsug lag khang de phyir byin no/ /'di ni re shig byung ba yin gyi bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
205b1('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bsod snyoms pa zhig gis khyim bdag cig skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa des khyim bdag de la rdzas
205b2('dul ba): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis kyang re shig rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i gzhi cung zhig bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /ci zhig
205b3('dul ba): bgyi/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol cig /de bzhin bgyi'o/ /na bza' dbul ba yang cung zad yod dam/ 'phags pa bdag ni longs spyod srab pa lags mod kyi ras zung gcig dbul lo/ /'phags pa
205b4('dul ba): khyod kyis sang bdag gi ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drang du gsol/ /bsod snyoms pa des tshogs pa'i dus su khyim bdag de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim
205b5('dul ba): gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa khyod khyim dad par byed par gyur to/ /bsod snyoms pa ci khyim bdag gis yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston gsol lam/ 'on te yon med pa'i
205b6('dul ba): mchod ston gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa dag yon dang bcas pa ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag de longs spyod srab pa lags pas 'di ltar ras zung gcig 'bul lo/ /nye dgas thos nas des bsams pa/ gang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
205b7('dul ba): 'dun la ras zung gcig 'bul ba de ni chen po la 'os pa zhig 'byung gor ma chag gis gal te bdag gis ras zung de ma phrogs na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo snyam nas nye dga' de'i phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
205b8('dul ba): thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / ji tsam na des khyim bdag de mchod ston sbyor ba mthong nas/ des khyim bdag de la dris pa/ khyim bdag ci byed/ 'phags pa mchod ston sbyor ro/ /khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gang dag snga dro'i
206a1('dul ba): dus kyi tshe lus kyis legs par spyad cing spyod/ /ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad cing spyod pa'i sems can de dag la dus de na snga dro bzang por nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/ sems can gang dag gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe dang / phyem
206a2('dul ba): 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe legs par spyad cing spyod/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad cing spyod pa'i sems can de dag la dus de na gung tshigs bzang po dang phyem bred bzang por nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de ni legs par gsungs
206a3('dul ba): pa yin no/ /khyim bdag gos sbyin pa yang cung zad yod dam/ 'phags pa bdag ni longs spyod srab pa lags te 'on kyang ras zung gcig 'bul lo/ khyim bdag ras zung de ci 'dra blta'o/ /des bstan pa dang ci tsam na bzang bar mthong
206a4('dul ba): nas nye dgas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni yod na yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni lan 'ga' yang med do bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la ras zung stong nyis brgya lnga bcus 'grub pas 'dis ni re shig
206a5('dul ba): chos gos kyi rdang kho na la yongs su zad par bya dgos par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zas kyi rnyed pa byung na ni pu la sa'i 'dab mas kyang bgo bar bya la/ gos kyi rnyed pa byung na ni mar me'i snying por rung bas kyang bgo bar bya
206a6('dul ba): 'o zhes gsungs na/ gal te 'ged par mi byed na khyod kyi 'di yang longs spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa gang gis bdag la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis la/ yongs su longs
206a7('dul ba): spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis par 'gyur pa'i thabs ci mchis/ khyim bdag gal te khyod kyis shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung pa/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa
206a8('dul ba): can gang yin pa de la ras zung 'di bskon na de lta na khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams dang / yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams su yang 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa shAkya'i
206b1('dul ba): rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can su mchis/ khyim bdag kho bo nyid shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang
206b2('dul ba): grol ba'i spobs pa can yin no/ /khyim bdag des nye dga' la 'phags pa khyod ras zung 'di bzhes shig ces sbyin par brtsams pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod sbyin pa sbyin yang mi shes sam/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
206b3('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol ba de'i tshe na khyod kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rjes su yi rang ba byed tu chug la kho bo la byin cig / 'phags pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khyim bdag des de las mnyan nas
206b4('dul ba): khyim bdag des de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol nas ras zung de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su yi rang bar mdzod cig / rjes su yi rang bar mdzod cig ces rjes su yi rang bar byed du bcug nas nye
206b5('dul ba): dga' la byin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis dge skos la smras pa/ nye dga' las ras zung de long shig /dge bskos kyis nye dga' la smras pa/ ras zung de 'on cig /ci gtsug lag khang du khyer te sbyin nam/ dge bskos kyis smras pa/ ma
206b6('dul ba): yin te/ 'di ni dge 'dun la phul ba yin no/ /nye dgas smras pa/ khyod ci'i phyir rang gi lhung bzed dang / chos gos dge 'dun la dbul bar mi byed/ 'di ni kho bo la byin pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon
206b7('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang bsod snyoms pa de skyengs nas de nyid tu 'dug go/ /de nas bsod snyoms pa des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhud nas ring po ma lon par
206b8('dul ba): rig nas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag gis gzhan du 'brug bsgrags la gzhan du char phab bo/ /'phags pa ji ltar bgyi/ btsun pa nye dga'i mchid nas khyim bdag khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni
207a1('dul ba): yod na yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni lan 'ga' yang med de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la ras zung stong nyis brgya lnga bcus 'grub pas 'di ni re shig chos gos kyi rdang kho na la yongs su zad par bya
207a2('dul ba): dgos par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zas kyi rnyed pa byung na ni pu la sa'i 'dab mas kyang bgo bar bya la/ gos kyi rnyed pa byung na ni mar me'i snying por rung bas kyang bgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ gal te bged par mi byed na ni khyod kyi 'di
207a3('dul ba): yang longs spyad par mi 'gyur ro zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa gang gis bdag la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams mchis la/ yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis par 'gyur ba'i
207a4('dul ba): thabs ci mchis shes bgyis na/ btsun pa nye dga'i mchid nas khyim bdag gal te khyod kyis shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can gang yin pa de la ras zung 'di
207a5('dul ba): bskon na de lta na khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams dang / yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams su yang 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/
207a6('dul ba): sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can su mchis shes bgyis na/ btsun pa nye dga' bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag kho bo nyid shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/
207a7('dul ba): chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin no zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis btsun pa nye dga' la 'phags pa khyod ras zung 'di bzhes shig ces sbyin par brtsams pa dang / btsun pa nye dga'i mchid nas khyim bdag khyod
207a8('dul ba): sbyin pa sbyin yang mi shes sam/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol ba de'i tshe khyod kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rjes su yi rang ba byed tu chug la kho bo la byin cig ces mchi nas/ bdag gis de kho
207b1('dul ba): na bzhin du bgyis pas 'di la bdag gis nongs pa ci mchis/ bsod snyoms pa de gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa dang ris 'thun pa gang yin pas kyang khyim bdag cig ji ltar dad pas bskyed
207b2('dul ba): na des kyang gzhan du 'brug bsgrags la gzhan du char phab bo/ /des smras pa/ des ci nyes 'di ltar der gcig gcig gis song ste 'di skad ces khyim bdag 'di ni khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni yod na/ yongs su longs spyad pa
207b3('dul ba): las byung ba'i bsod nams ni lan 'ga' yang med de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la ras zung stong nyis brgya lnga bcus 'grub pas 'di ni re shig chos gos kyi rdang kho na la yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
207b4('dul ba): kyang zas kyi rnyed pa byung na ni pu la sa'i 'dab mas kyang bgo bar bya la/ gos kyi rnyed pa byung na ni mar me'i snying por rung bas kyang bgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs na gal te 'ged par mi byed na ni khyod kyi 'di yang longs spyad par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer
207b5('dul ba): nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa gang gis bdag la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis la/ yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci mchis zhes byas na/ de na re 'di skad ces gal
207b6('dul ba): te khyod kyis shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can gang yin pa de la ras zung 'di bskon na de lta na khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba bsod nams dang yongs su longs spyad pa las byung
207b7('dul ba): ba'i bsod nams su yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ /des 'di skad ces shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can su yod ces byas na de na re kho bo nyid shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod
207b8('dul ba): gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin no zhes zer nas/ des de la ras zung de sbyin par brtsams pa dang / de na re khyim bdag khyod sbyin yang mi shes sam/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod
208a1('dul ba): ston gsol ba de'i tshe khyod kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rjes su yi rang bar byed du chug la kho bo la byin cig ces zer nas/ des de kho na bzhin byas pas des nyes pa ci yod/ /dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun
208a2('dul ba): la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la sngos 'jug ces smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
208a3('dul ba): gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/
208a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/ nye dga' khyod dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la bsngor 'jug pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi
208a5('dul ba): tshul ma yin pa/ /rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/ dge slong
208a6('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi
208a7('dul ba): 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /
208a8('dul ba): dge 'dun la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la'o/ /bsngos pa'i zhes bya ba ni gzas pa'i 'o/ /rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa gnyis te/ gos kyi rnyed pa dang / zas kyi rnyed pa ste/ don 'dir ni gos kyi
208b1('dul ba): rnyed pa yin par dgongs so/ /shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis de shes par gyur pa 'am/ gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/ /gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bdag la 'bul du 'jud na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po
208b2('dul ba): de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa/ de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis gang
208b3('dul ba): zag gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gos gang zag gnyis la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag la sgyur du
208b4('dul ba): 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag rab tu mang po dag la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas
208b5('dul ba): su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong
208b6('dul ba): gis gang zag gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag gzhan gcig la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag gzhan
208b7('dul ba): gnyis la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang
208b8('dul ba): zag gzhan rab tu mang po dag la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa dge 'dun la

209a2('dul ba): 'gyur la/ thob na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag gnyis la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag gzhan gnyis la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag

209a6('dul ba): rab tu mang po dag la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag gzhan rab tu mang po dag la sgyur du 'jud na de sgyur du 'jud pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na yang nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gang zag rab tu mang po dag la bsngos
